description: We are looking for a Customer Experience Advocate to join our expanding team. There are a few things we take really seriously here at monday.com: building an amazing product and providing the best possible service to our customers. Our clients love our product, and it's incredibly unique (and fun) to provide support in an environment where the vast majority of interactions are so positive. About the role:Engage with customers across a variety of channels, including live chat, email (tickets), phone, and screen sharesEmpower customers to connect their goals and challenges with the solution in monday.comCollaborate with internal technical teams and engage users for the full bug life cycle, from reports to verifying bug fixesServe as the liaison between our customers and the rest of the monday.com team to advocate and help shape the best possible version of our productLead online webinars and one-on-one demos to educate customers on the features of our platform and developer toolkitCreate both internal and external documentation to enhance our knowledge baseAdvise customers about new features and functionalities

description: Job Summary The Sales, Services and Support (S3) Academy is designed for entry-level talent. It includes a robust 90 day training, business integration support, and other tailored programs to promote professional development and community. During this training, Academy Participants gain the foundational knowledge needed to have a basic understanding of the Storage Industry, NetApp, and products and solutions. Additionally, they effectively develop transferable soft skills that will allow them to excel within the organization and in their long- term careers. We are seeking candidates for an entry-level position with 2-3 years of professional experience in the tech support field. This role is designed for individuals looking to build on their existing skills and take the next step in their career. The Technical Support Engineer (TSE) role focuses on diagnosing, troubleshooting, and debugging technical problems associated with NetApp Hardware and Software both on premises and in the Cloud.  A TSE will respond to situations where first-line product support has failed to isolate or fix problems in the field. TSEs are expected to be able to handle multiple concurrent issues while documenting all pertinent information pertaining to troubleshooting and resolving issues via CRM. TSEs will capture and record all knowledge learned via the NetApp Knowledge Base.  We are seeking an energized, self-motivated, team player to work in a fast-paced, high-pressured, dynamic environment providing remote technical support to NetApp Customers, Partners, and Field Engineers via chat, phone, email, and remote sessions.    Responsibilities include:Triage and troubleshoot NetApp systems and products via chat, phone, email and remote sessions with customers, partners, and internal field engineersRead and analyze various system and application logs to determine where an issue is.Ask customers targeted questions to diagnose problems and provide timely solutions.Research documentation and knowledgebase articles and collaborate with team members to determine proper troubleshooting course of actionProvide timely updates to customers on status and progress of cases and properly set expectations.Prioritize and manage several open issues at one time, while quickly determining if issues are more complex and need to be escalated to next tierCreate and/or improve Support Knowledge Base to document issues, errors, and solutions so repeated problems can be solved quicker.Ensure issues are documented thoroughly, clearly citing customer’s problem, business impact, troubleshooting steps, any steps taken to reproduce the issue, resolution, and any other pertinent information into CRM systemUnderstand conditions in which a field issue could be escalatedCollaborate with downstream teams to resolve technical issues Job Requirements Highly proficient written and verbal communication skillsAbility to work under pressure and respond calmly in high stress situationsTeam oriented individual that can also work independently, in office and remote, with minimal supervisionCan demonstrate proficient problem solving, troubleshooting, and diagnosis skillsBasic technical understanding in two or more of the following areas: Computer hardware or software, Storage, RAID, Networking, NAS, SAN, Authentication, Encryption, Cloud (Google Cloud, AWS, Azure), Virtualization, Performance (Resource utilizations or infrastructure bottlenecks), Windows, Unix or Linux Experience This position typically requires a minimum of 2 years of relevant work experience.Additional Details Job Posting Info: This is a pipeline position that will be opened on a recurring basis and used to fill roles aligned with the required skill sets. Recruiting efforts will be ongoing until specific teams find an ideal match. Thrive Together: In-office interactions are critical to achieving stronger, more integrated results. NetApp introduced Thrive Together to support increased in-office engagements globally. Thrive Together is an intentional progression of the company’s approach to hybrid work designed to foster stronger connections and collaboration and drive enhanced business performance.CompensationThe base salary range for this position is $83,000 - $117,000 and will be determined by the candidate's location, qualifications, experience, and education. Final compensation packages are competitive and in line with industry standards, reflecting a variety of factors, and include a comprehensive benefits package. This may cover Health Insurance, Life Insurance, Retirement or Pension Plans, Paid Time Off (PTO), various Leave options, Performance-Based Incentives, employee stock purchase plan, and/or restricted stocks (RSU’s), with all offerings subject to regional variations and governed by local laws, regulations, and company policies. Benefits may vary by country and region, and further details will be provided as part of the recruitment process.Equal Opportunity Employer:NetApp is firmly committed to Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) and to compliance with all federal, state and local laws that prohibit employment discrimination based on age, race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, religion, disability or genetic information, pregnancy, protected veteran status, and any other protected classification. Did you know...Statistics show women apply to jobs only when they're 100% qualified. But no one is 100% qualified. We encourage you to shift the trend and apply anyway! We look forward to hearing from you. Why NetApp?We are all about helping customers turn challenges into business opportunity. It starts with bringing new thinking to age-old problems, like how to use data most effectively to run better - but also to innovate. We tailor our approach to the customer's unique needs with a combination of fresh thinking and proven approaches.We enable a healthy work-life balance. Our volunteer time off program is best in class, offering employees 40 hours of paid time per year to volunteer with their favorite organizations. We provide comprehensive medical, dental, wellness, and vision plans for you and your family. We offer educational assistance, legal services, and access to discounts. Finally, we provide financial savings programs to help you plan for your future.If you want to help us build knowledge and solve big problems, let's talk.
Requirements: Highly proficient written and verbal communication skills Ability to work under pressure and respond calmly in high stress situations Team oriented individual that can also work independently, in office and remote, with minimal supervision Can demonstrate proficient problem solving, troubleshooting, and diagnosis skills Basic technical understanding in two or more of the following areas: Computer hardware or software, Storage, RAID, Networking, NAS, SAN, Authentication, Encryption, Cloud (Google Cloud, AWS, Azure), Virtualization, Performance (Resource utilizations or infrastructure bottlenecks), Windows, Unix or Linux,

Benefits may vary by country and region, and further details will be provided as part of the recruitment process.Equal Opportunity Employer:NetApp is firmly committed to Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) and to compliance with all federal, state and local laws that prohibit employment discrimination based on age, race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, religion, disability or genetic information, pregnancy, protected veteran status, and any other protected classification. Did you know...Statistics show women apply to jobs only when they're 100% qualified. But no one is 100% qualified. We encourage you to shift the trend and apply anyway! We look forward to hearing from you. Why NetApp?We are all about helping customers turn challenges into business opportunity. It starts with bringing new thinking to age-old problems, like how to use data most effectively to run better - but also to innovate. We tailor our approach to the customer's unique needs with a combination of fresh thinking and proven approaches.We enable a healthy work-life balance. Our volunteer time off program is best in class, offering employees 40 hours of paid time per year to volunteer with their favorite organizations. We provide comprehensive medical, dental, wellness, and vision plans for you and your family. We offer educational assistance, legal services, and access to discounts. Finally, we provide financial savings programs to help you plan for your future.If you want to help us build knowledge and solve big problems, let's talk.

description: We’re hiring a contract Learning Designer to design and create engaging content and curriculum for beginner English learners who use Toko to improve their spoken conversation skills. Our users are adult, native Chinese speakers who mostly live in Taiwan and Hong Kong. 💻 What you'll doDesign curriculum for our Beginner English (A2) Tutoring course (focused on spoken English conversation), such that users are able to apply learned words, phrases, and sentence patterns in spoken conversation upon completing a unitLeverage a corpus to select commonly used and appropriately leveled words, phrases, and sentence patternsWrite example exercises for users to learn selected words, phrases, sentence patternsCollaborate with our technical team to integrate curriculum into our mobile app 😄 Who you areYou have 3+ years of recent experience creating curriculum for spoken conversational English, preferably for native Chinese speakersYou are familiar with CEFR standardsYou have experience with corpus-based English learning methodologiesYou can work during East Coast business hours (to facilitate collaboration)You have classroom teaching or 1:1 English tutoring experience, preferable with native Chinese speakersYou're tech-savvy and frequently use mobile apps, Slack, Zoom, etc.You have strong written and verbal communication skills in English 🍰 BonusYou have a background in linguistics (MA or PhD) or TESOLYou have experience developing content for language learning apps or online language learning platforms

job_title: [2025] Software Engineer, Game Engine Programmability - New Grad
description: You will work with us on the design and implementation of Luau, the embedded scripting language in the Roblox engine. Developers on the Roblox platform rely on our team to deliver a comprehensive set of development tools, an ultra-fast multithreaded runtime, and a state of the art gradual type system to power those development tools. Positively impact the lives of millions of developers daily by improving the design, performance, safety, usability, and accessibility of their developer tools. You will report to the Game Engine Programmability team. You ArePassionate about developing software development environments, especially for game developers.Proficient in C++ and familiar with a variety of significantly different programming languagesThink exposure to different paradigms, not just half a dozen flavors of Java.Useful to have: experience working with and/or implementing more sophisticated type systems (OCaml, Haskell, Idris, TypeScript, Flow), experience developing APIs and tools, game development, Lua or Luau programming knowledge and compiler development experienceResponsible: You build systems that work and keep on working optimally.You WillHelp our team continue to develop an innovative gradual type system for Luau that leverages key ideas from the past few decades of programming languages research including semantic sub-typing, e-graphs, and type functionsDevelop new language features that extend the realm of what’s possible and what’s productive for our creators while retaining Luau’s identity as a language built around small, powerful and reusable primitivesImprove the usability of the type system for all users, ranging from beginners who are unfamiliar with what types even are to professional developers with decades of experience.Collaborate with engineers across several engineering organizations ranging from the teams developing Roblox’s application in Luau to the teams developing the Roblox Studio IDE for creators to the engine itself.

job_title: [2025] Software Engineer, Game Engine Reliability - New Grad
description: We're looking for an outstanding New College Graduate to join our Game Engine Reliability team where you will make a direct impact on the very foundation of Roblox. In this role, you'll be at the forefront of enhancing engine stability and reliability, particularly focusing on performance and crash metrics. You'll develop innovative software solutions to detect, mitigate, and isolate engine incidents, automating processes to catch issues early and drive our reliability metrics to new heights.If you're excited by the challenge of solving complex, large-scale problems in the gaming world—especially in the realm of UGC, scale, and C++—and love working alongside passionate, experienced engineers, this is the perfect opportunity for you to thrive on our dynamic and growing game engine team.For more information, you can visit our Software Engineer site page here. You Are:Possessing/possess an undergraduate/graduate degree in Computer Science, engineering or a related fieldProficient in one or more programming languages such as Python, C++, Typescript, and C#Passionate about games, user-generated content, and social networkingA problem solver who excels in ambiguous environments and quickly develops proficiency in coding standardsYou Will:Design, code, test, and debug featuresShip code to productionWork with Roblox's Design, Product, Data, QA, and DevOps teamsReport to one of our many teams to coordinate any products or features you are working on
Requirements: If you're excited by the challenge of solving complex, large-scale problems in the gaming world—especially in the realm of UGC, scale, and C++—and love working alongside passionate, experienced engineers, this is the perfect opportunity for you to thrive on our dynamic and growing game engine team. For more information, you can visit our Software Engineer site page here .

description: Prior Experience as a Paralegal Required*****How to Apply:Interested candidates should submit their resume to Oliver@WickardAI.comAbout Us:At Riveting Technology, we develop cutting-edge technologies designed to transform industries. Our latest innovation, WickardAI, focuses on AI-powered document review and eDiscovery solutions tailored specifically for law firms. WickardAI enhances legal practice efficiency and delivers advanced AI-driven tools for managing complex legal documents. We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Paralegal to join our team and support both client needs and the continuous improvement of our AI system Intro Video to the WickardAI Platform: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bz6egOFHM0c Role Overview:As a Paralegal with WickardAI, you will gain valuable experience working closely with WickardAI's CEO, who is a practicing attorney.Your responsibilities will include reviewing legal documents for clients, assisting in the quality assessment of AI-generated outputs, and contributing to the improvement of the accuracy and functionality of our AI-powered system.Key Responsibilities:Document Review: Review and analyze legal documents for clients, ensuring accuracy and compliance with legal standards.Case Law Research: Conduct thorough research on case law to provide relevant information and insights for our platform.AI Quality Review: Evaluate the accuracy of AI-generated outputs and provide feedback to improve system functionality.Docket Management: Retrieve and review cases from state and federal dockets to ensure comprehensive data for analysis.Industry Research: Investigate and report on legal trends and developments in AI and eDiscovery to inform platform enhancements.Requirements:Education: A degree or certification in Paralegal Studies, Legal Studies, or a related field.Prior Experience as a Paralegal Required*****Document Review Skills: Strong ability to review and analyze legal documents with a high degree of accuracy.Research Skills: Experience conducting detailed legal research and analyzing case law and legal materials.Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy and attention to detail in reviewing case data and AI outputs.Analytical Abilities: Proficient in analyzing trends and synthesizing information from various sources.Communication Skills: Effective written and verbal communication skills for documenting and presenting findings.Team Collaboration: Ability to work effectively with team members and contribute to a positive and collaborative environment.What We Offer:Hands-On Experience: Gain practical experience in legal document review, research, and AI technology within a cutting-edge environment.Mentorship: Work closely with experienced professionals and receive guidance to enhance your skills and knowledge.Innovative Environment: Be part of a forward-thinking company dedicated to advancing legal technology. job_title: Product Market Analyst（Minor Languages）【For Chinese students or non-Chinese students studying in China】
description: ！How to apply ！：Visit https://app.mokahr.com/su/zfvakd , find the Job Title and apply. You can go straight to the official website to submit your application through this link, and your resume will be processed more quickly.You will be responsible for:1、Conducting comprehensive strategic analysis of the local air ticket market, including market size, competitors, consumer demands, and other research and analysis.2、Based on the market analysis results, develop and execute relevant marketing strategies to enhance the company's visibility and market share in the local market.3、Regularly monitor and evaluate market competition, make timely adjustments to marketing strategies to maintain the company's competitive advantage in the local market.4、Track market trends and changes, provide timely insights and recommendations to support the company's business development in the local market.5、Assist in developing and implementing quality improvement plans to enhance service quality and customer satisfaction in the local market.6、Collaborate closely with internal departments such as sales, marketing, and customer service to drive business development in the local market.We expect you to:1、Fluent in both Chinese and English/French/Cantonese/Dutch/Portuguese.2、Strong market analysis and research abilities, familiar with market research methods and tools. Familiarity with overseas market culture and tourism culture is a plus.3、Strong data analysis and interpretation skills, proficient in using office software such as Excel and PowerPoint, basic SQL skills.4、Strong teamwork and communication skills, able to effectively coordinate internal and external resources.5、Strong problem-solving and execution abilities, able to independently complete work tasks.

job_title: [2025] Software Engineer, Game Engine Network - New Grad
description: We're looking for an outstanding New College Graduate to join our Game Engine Network team where you will make a direct impact on the very foundation of Roblox. This team supports massive immersive worlds with huge player counts on multiple devices by dynamically ensuring that clients have only what they need. In this role, you will help connect people on the Roblox platform by supporting low end devices while our experiences get larger and more immersive.If you're excited by the challenge of solving complex, large-scale problems in the gaming world—especially in the realm of UGC, scale, and C++—and love working alongside passionate, experienced engineers, this is the perfect opportunity for you to thrive on our dynamic and growing game engine team.For more information, you can visit our Software Engineer site page here. job_title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern (Foundation Model Applications)- 2024 Off-Cycle (PHD)
description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. Why Join UsCreation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.Join us. We are a pioneering Machine Learning team at TikTok, committed to spearheading innovation in leveraging cutting-edge technologies in foundation models to enhance TikTok's experience, an avenue that our organization sees as a very promising future direction. Our team culture cherishes the "First Principles Thinking" approach, and we deeply value understanding things at their core and focusing on delivering solid, well-grounded solutions. We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2024. Internships at TikTok aim to offer students industry exposure and hands-on experience. Turn your ambitions into reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at TikTok. This Internship Program runs for 10-24 weeks. Candidates can also apply for both Off-cycle Intern position and Program Intern position. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. We encourage you to apply early. Candidates can apply to a maximum of TWO positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early. Responsibilities- Understand and optimize TikTok's industry-leading recommendation system- Deploy, prompt, and fine-tune cutting-edge foundation models- Apply foundation models to enhance TikTok's recommendation system and product offerings, improving the experience of billion-scale consumers and creators- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, data scientists, and product engineers, to form and solve problems, refine machine learning algorithms, and communicate results- Regularly run A/B tests, perform analyses, and iterate algorithms based on results- Work with infrastructure teams on improving the efficiency and stability of machine learning systems Qualifications- Currently pursuing PHD degree- Graduating December 2024 onwards with the intent to return to degree program after the completion of the internship- Able to commit to working for 12 weeks during Summer 2024- Hands-on experience in one or more of the following areas: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Recommender Systems, Data Mining, Natural Language Processing, or Computer Vision- Strong programming skills in Python and/or C/C++, and a deep understanding of data structures and algorithms- Familiar with architecture and implementation of at least one mainstream machine learning programming framework (TensorFlow/PyTorch/MXNet)- Excellent communication and teamwork skills, and a passion for learning new techniques and tackling challenging problems.- Must obtain work authorization in country of employment at the time of hire, and maintain ongoing work authorization during employment. Requirements: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.  Why Join Us Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. Join us.  We are a pioneering Machine Learning team at TikTok, committed to spearheading innovation in leveraging cutting-edge technologies in foundation models to enhance TikTok's experience, an avenue that our organization sees as a very promising future direction. Our team culture cherishes the "First Principles Thinking" approach, and we deeply value understanding things at their core and focusing on delivering solid, well-grounded solutions.  We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2024. Internships at TikTok aim to offer students industry exposure and hands-on experience. Turn your ambitions into reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at TikTok.  This Internship Program runs for 10-24 weeks. Candidates can also apply for both Off-cycle Intern position and Program Intern position.  Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. We encourage you to apply early. Candidates can apply to a maximum of TWO positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. description: Seed Oil Scout (SOS) is a rapidly growing tech company in the food and dining space. Our iOS app, ranking in the top 50 globally in Food & Drink, is dedicated to bringing transparency to restaurant sourcing and ingredients. With over 1M downloads and 300K Instagram followers, including high-profile celebrities, we're changing American dining for the better.SOS is a unique tech company in that it's grown past 1M users with no employees, getting incredible leverage out of AI code generation and content creation. SOS has achieved incredible marketing success through novel AI-backed techniques, such as the hit country single, 1950's magazine spread, and powerful AI narration, wowing millions of viewers for pennies compared to larger competitors.The RoleWe're seeking a talented and motivated Data Science Intern to join our innovative team. This role is perfect for a new graduate or senior in college looking to gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced, AI-driven startup environment.Technologies We UseNode.jsApify for web scrapingAmplitudeBigQuerySQLResponsibilitiesAssist in defining and instrumenting key metrics for growth and product developmentAnalyze user behavior and app performance using tools like Amplitude and BigQueryDevelop and maintain data pipelines for efficient data processing and analysisParticipate in web scraping projects using Apify to gather restaurant and ingredient dataCollaborate with the team to derive actionable insights from data to drive business decisionsContribute to the development of AI-backed marketing techniquesQualificationsPursuing a degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related fieldStrong programming skills, particularly in Python or JavaScriptFamiliarity with SQL and database managementExperience with data visualization tools and techniquesBasic understanding of machine learning conceptsExcellent problem-solving and analytical skillsAbility to work independently and as part of a teamPassion for food, nutrition, and transparency in the food industryDesired SkillsFamiliarity with web scraping techniquesExperience with Node.jsKnowledge of cloud platforms (preferably Google Cloud Platform)Understanding of statistical analysis and hypothesis testingInterest in AI and its applications in business and marketingWhat We OfferHands-on experience in a high-growth startup environmentExposure to cutting-edge AI and data science techniquesOpportunity to make a significant impact on a widely-used applicationMentorship from experienced professionals in the tech industryPotential for full-time employment upon successful completion of the internshipJoin us at Seed Oil Scout and be part of a team that's revolutionizing the dining industry through technology and data-driven insights!
Requirements: We're seeking a talented and motivated Data Science Intern to join our innovative team. This role is perfect for a new graduate or senior in college looking to gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced, AI-driven startup environment., Assist in defining and instrumenting key metrics for growth and product development Analyze user behavior and app performance using tools like Amplitude and BigQuery Develop and maintain data pipelines for efficient data processing and analysis Participate in web scraping projects using Apify to gather restaurant and ingredient data Collaborate with the team to derive actionable insights from data to drive business decisions Contribute to the development of AI-backed marketing techniques, Pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field Strong programming skills, particularly in Python or JavaScript Familiarity with SQL and database management Experience with data visualization tools and techniques Basic understanding of machine learning concepts Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills Ability to work independently and as part of a team Passion for food, nutrition, and transparency in the food industry, Familiarity with web scraping techniques Experience with Node.js Knowledge of cloud platforms (preferably Google Cloud Platform) Understanding of statistical analysis and hypothesis testing Interest in AI and its applications in business and marketing

description: We are seeking a talented and creative individual to join our team. This internship offers a unique opportunity to explore the intersection of artificial intelligence and illustration, contributing to the creation of innovative visual content. As an intern, you will collaborate closely with our design and AI teams to develop captivating illustrations using AI-powered tools and techniques.ResponsibilitiesDigital Marketing Support: Assist in developing and implementing digital marketing strategies across platforms such as TikTok, YouTube, Snapchat, Pinterest, Threads, Facebook, X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and LinkedIn.Visual Content Creation: Produce engaging visual content tailored for various social media channels.Project Collaboration: Work with the design team to understand project requirements and objectives, ensuring alignment with overall goals.AI Illustration: Utilize AI-powered illustration software and tools, such as Midjourney or similar platforms, to create visually appealing and innovative illustrations. Creative Brainstorming: Participate in brainstorming sessions to generate creative ideas and concepts for illustration projects.Team Communication: Communicate and collaborate effectively with team members to ensure the timely delivery of high-quality illustrations.Trend Monitoring: Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in AI illustration and related technologies to keep our content fresh and relevant.QualificationsCurrently pursuing or recently graduated with a degree in Graphic Design, Video Design, Digital Art, Illustration, or a related field.Proficiency in AI illustration software such as Midjourney or similar tools.Strong artistic and creative abilities with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.Ability to work independently and take ownership of projects.Excellent communication and collaboration skills.Passion for exploring the intersection of art and technology.BenefitsHands-On Experience: Gain practical experience in the emerging field of AI illustration.Mentorship and Guidance: Work closely with experienced professionals who will provide mentorship and support.Meaningful Contribution: Contribute to real projects and make a significant impact on our design and AI initiatives.Skill Development: Learn and develop skills in AI technologies and tools, enhancing your professional portfolio.Career Opportunities: Potential for future employment or strong recommendations based on performance.CompensationThis is an unpaid internship, with the possibility of receiving academic credit.How to ApplyInterested candidates can apply at https://forms.gle/MZqwYrrPMBbWUFXo7.
Requirements: Digital Marketing Support : Assist in developing and implementing digital marketing strategies across platforms such as TikTok, YouTube, Snapchat, Pinterest, Threads, Facebook, X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and LinkedIn. Visual Content Creation : Produce engaging visual content tailored for various social media channels. Project Collaboration : Work with the design team to understand project requirements and objectives, ensuring alignment with overall goals. AI Illustration : Utilize AI-powered illustration software and tools, such as Midjourney or similar platforms, to create visually appealing and innovative illustrations. Creative Brainstorming : Participate in brainstorming sessions to generate creative ideas and concepts for illustration projects. Team Communication : Communicate and collaborate effectively with team members to ensure the timely delivery of high-quality illustrations. Trend Monitoring : Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in AI illustration and related technologies to keep our content fresh and relevant., Currently pursuing or recently graduated with a degree in Graphic Design, Video Design, Digital Art, Illustration, or a related field. Proficiency in AI illustration software such as Midjourney or similar tools. Strong artistic and creative abilities with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics. Ability to work independently and take ownership of projects. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Passion for exploring the intersection of art and technology.

description: Resilience, Inc. is a nonprofit organization that is dedicated to improving the mental health of students, as well as reducing mass shootings, suicide, and depression. Resilience, Inc. also works to combat declining test scores, low student engagement, and a slew of other social issues. Our organization focuses on offering Social Emotional Learning tools to enable K-12 schools to teach emotional intelligence through 5 core topics: self-awareness, self-control, social awareness, relationship management, goal setting & effective decision-making. We also provide tools for acquiring and maintaining inspiration, hope, social beings, and overall well-being. Our mission is to teach SEL tools at every school in the country. It is a tough challenge, but we know “No Challenge, No Change.” If you are also concerned about children’s mental health and social well-being, join us! Become a member of Resilience, Inc. and help change the way schools approach mental health. Resilience offers unpaid internship programs that require at least a 4-month commitment with a minimum of 5 hours per week and team meetings weekly. Availability must also allow for as-needed meetings/phone calls. There are flexible start and end dates with the option to continue after meeting the minimum requirement. Job Summary: The Grants and Contract Specialist is responsible for identifying funding opportunities, preparing proposals, negotiating contract terms, and ensuring that all grant and contract activities comply with regulatory and organizational standards. This role involves managing the documentation, reporting, and communication processes throughout the lifecycle of grants and contracts. Key Responsibilities: Grant and Contract Management: -Research and identify potential grant opportunities and funding sources.-Prepare, review, and submit grant proposals, budgets, and supporting documents.-Manage the proposal submission process, including coordinating with internal teams and external partners. Compliance and Reporting: -Ensure adherence to all grant and contract requirements, including deadlines, reporting, and documentation.-Monitor and track spending, budgets, and project timelines to meet funder requirements.-Prepare and submit financial and programmatic reports to funders on a timely basis. Documentation and Record-Keeping: -Maintain organized records of all grant and contract agreements, amendments, and correspondences.-Ensure accurate documentation and filing of reports, invoices, and related paperwork. Communication and Coordination: -Act as the primary point of contact between the organization and funders.-Collaborate with program managers, finance teams, and other stakeholders to gather information for proposals and reports.-Provide guidance to staff on grant and contract policies and procedures. Qualifications: -Studying Business Administration, Public Administration, Finance, or a related field (relevant experience may be considered in place of a degree).-Excellent written and verbal communication skills.-Proficient in the English language.-Strong analytical, organizational, and time management abilities.-Proficiency in grant management software, budgeting tools, and Microsoft Office Suite.

You can go straight to the official website to submit your application through this link, and your resume will be processed more quickly.You will be responsible for:1、Responsible for application of cutting-edge LLM research related with RLHF/SFT/RAG... in actual NLP/AIGC scenarios.2、Responsible for machine learning model development various AI tasks in multilingual scenarios * NLU/search/advertising/user portraits etc.3、Understanding objectives in international tourism business, mining/identifying/extracting/building knowledge graph/libraries acoss products/contents/materials.We expect you to:1、Graduate with a background in Computer Science or a related technical discipline.2、Rich experiences and strong skills in the following areas: machine translation, natural language generation, large-scale pretraining, large language models, etc.3、Strong computer science and coding skills and problem-solving skills.4、Good sense of teamwork and communication skills.5、Candidates with top conference （ACL, EMNLP, NIPS, AAAI, etc.) papers or influential open-source projects are preferred.

description: Job Title: Remote Teaching Assistant (Education/Psychology)Job Type: Part-time, Remote (work-from-home), long-termCompany: PieJob Corp.Website: piejob.comAre you a college student with a passion for education or psychology? Join our team at PieJob Corp. as a part-time Remote Teaching Assistant. We're seeking dedicated individuals to facilitate engaging learning experiences for high school students. As a Teaching Assistant, you'll have the opportunity to make a meaningful impact, hone your teaching skills, and contribute to students' academic growth.Role Highlights:Lead and facilitate dynamic classroom discussions and activities, focusing on AP Psychology topics, under the guidance of experienced teachers.Provide valuable support to high school students, assisting with homework, answering questions, and providing guidance on college applications for 9th to 12th graders.Collaborate with our management team to craft and implement weekly lesson plans that align with the curriculum and learning objectives.Build positive and productive relationships with students, professors, teachers, and parents by maintaining open communication and addressing concerns promptly and professionally.Conduct virtual meetings with students and parents using platforms like Zoom to share progress updates and address any queries or concerns.Qualifications:Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Education, Psychology, or a related field.Maintain a decent college GPA.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, enabling effective interaction with students and colleagues from diverse backgrounds and learning styles.Previous teaching or tutoring experience is advantageous.Familiarity with the AP Psychology curriculum and experience in college application processes are desirable.Strong organizational and time-management abilities allow you to easily juggle multiple responsibilities.About PieJobSince 2013, PieJob has been a pioneering online academy, providing after-school programs for high school students and guiding them through the college application journey. Founded initially as an MIT-based startup, we've evolved into a culture that embraces the next generation of education, featuring Human-Centered Computing, Artificial Intelligence, and Project-based Teacher-Parent Collaboration.How to Apply:To apply, please email your resume in PDF format to hr@piejob.com. Ensure to include the keywords "Teaching Assistant (Education/Psychology)" in the subject line of your email. We appreciate your interest in joining the PieJob team!

description: About Us: Bmore Studio is a dynamic TikTok live creator agency devoted to empowering TikTok creators and partners to boost their followers, craft innovative content, and turn their creative abilities into lucrative opportunities.Position Overview: We are seeking talented and enthusiastic Streamers to join our team. As a streamer at Bmore Studio, you will have the opportunity to showcase your talents, engage with your audience, and create captivating content on TikTok LIVE. This role is perfect for individuals passionate about live streaming and eager to grow their community and maximize their earnings.Key Responsibilities:Live Streaming: Conduct live streams on TikTok LIVE, engaging with viewers through E-Commerce and Entertainment content.Audience Engagement: Build and maintain a loyal fanbase by interacting with followers, responding to comments, and fostering community spirit.Content Creation: Work with our creative team to plan and produce high-quality, engaging content.Skill Enhancement: Participate in training sessions and receive feedback from our experts to improve your live streaming techniques.Monetization: Implement various strategies to monetize your content and maximize earnings on TikTok LIVE.Group Streaming: Top performers will have the opportunity to participate in our group streaming sessions.Qualifications:Passion for live streaming and social media, with an understanding of current trending content.Talents in hosting, music, dance, acting, or similar areas.Excellent communication skills and the ability to engage with an online audience.Strong organizational and time management skills.A TikTok account is highly preferred.Fluent in English; proficiency in Chinese or Spanish is a plus.Benefits:Flexible working hoursReferral incentivesProfessional training and development opportunitiesAccess to professional studios and equipmentThe chance to be part of a fast-growing company at the forefront of TikTok content creation

description: Hello! Thank you for taking time to review this opportunity.Company Overview: The Creative Bomb is a leading mobile app and web development company specializing in innovative and custom app/web solutions for businesses of all sizes. We are committed to delivering high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications that drive business growth and enhance user experiences.Location: RemoteOverview: This is a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in sales and marketing earning a base salary of $500-$1,000 per month while earning commission for every successful lead or sale you generate. We are seeking a motivated and dynamic Sales and Marketing Intern to join our team on a commission-only basis. If you are a self-starter with a passion for technology and a knack for sales, we want to hear from you!Responsibilities:Identify and generate new business opportunities through various channels (e.g., social media, phone calls, email campaigns, networking events).Conduct market research to identify potential clients and industries for our mobile app development services.Reach out to potential clients to present our services and identify their needs.Track and report on sales performance, including leads generated, sales closed, and commissions earned.Base Salary: We offer a base salary of $500-$1,000 per month based on performance.Commission Structure:Earn a competitive commission for each successful lead or sale. This means even generating an incoming email to The Creative Bomb that leads into a sale, you are paid the commission.Our sales range between $5,000 and $250,000 per project acquired.Commission structure:10% commission on sales.Commission example:Your lead generates a $50,000 sale, you earn $5,000.Learning Opportunities:Gain hands-on experience in sales and marketing within the tech industry.Develop valuable skills in lead generation, client relationship management, and sales strategy.Opportunity to work closely with experienced professionals and receive mentorship.Expand your professional network within the tech and startup community.Qualifications:Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a relevant degree program (e.g., Business, Marketing, Communications).Strong interest in sales and marketing within the tech industry.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Self-motivated with a strong work ethic and ability to work independently.Basic understanding of mobile app/web development is a plus but not required.Work Hours:Flexible work hours with a minimum commitment of 20 hours per week.Remote position, allowing you to work from anywhere.Duration:1-month internship with the possibility of extension based on performance and mutual agreement. Open to negotiation.
Requirements: Identify and generate new business opportunities through various channels (e.g., social media, phone calls, email campaigns, networking events). Conduct market research to identify potential clients and industries for our mobile app development services. Reach out to potential clients to present our services and identify their needs. Track and report on sales performance, including leads generated, sales closed, and commissions earned., Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a relevant degree program (e.g., Business, Marketing, Communications). Strong interest in sales and marketing within the tech industry. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Self-motivated with a strong work ethic and ability to work independently. Basic understanding of mobile app/web development is a plus but not required.

description: Alignerr.com is a community of subject matter experts from several disciplines who align AI models by creating high-quality data in their field of expertise to build the future of Generative AI. Alignerr is operated by Labelbox. Labelbox is the leading data-centric AI platform for building intelligent applications. Teams looking to capitalize on the latest advances in generative AI and LLMs use the Labelbox platform to inject these systems with the right degree of human supervision and automation. Whether they are building AI products by using LLMs that require human fine-tuning, or applying AI to reduce the time associated with manually-intensive tasks like data labeling or finding business insights, Labelbox enables teams to do so effectively and quickly.Current Labelbox customers are transforming industries within insurance, retail, manufacturing/robotics, healthcare, and beyond. Our platform is used by Fortune 500 enterprises including Walmart, Procter & Gamble, Genentech, and Adobe, as well as hundreds of leading AI teams. We are backed by leading investors including SoftBank, Andreessen Horowitz, B Capital, Gradient Ventures (Google's AI-focused fund), Databricks Ventures, Snowpoint Ventures and Kleiner Perkins.About the Role Shape the future of AI in Genetics.This innovative role as an AI Trainer - Genetics offers a unique opportunity to leverage your subject-matter expertise and develop your AI skills. You will play a pivotal role in training AI models, ensuring the accuracy and relevance of Genetics content generated by AI. This position allows for flexible scheduling, and your contributions will directly impact the advancement of AI in Genetics.Your Day to Day Educate AI: Analyze and provide feedback on AI-generated outputs related to Genetics. Your guidance will directly improve the AI's accuracy and ability to apply its knowledge to real-world problems.Problem Solving: Using your expertise, you will provide step-by-step solutions and explanations to complex problems in Genetics. Your input will be crucial in teaching the AI how to reason through these problems effectively.Red Teaming: Utilize your deep understanding of the field to identify potential biases, limitations, or inaccuracies in the AI's knowledge base. Design and conduct tests that push the boundaries of the model's understanding, ensuring its outputs are reliable and applicable to real-world scenarios.You create your own working hours depending on project length.About You Enrolled in or have completed an Associates’ degree or higher from an accredited institution.Possess a strong writing style with excellent English-language spelling and grammar skills.Have a critical eye and the ability to clearly articulate the strengths and weaknesses of written text.Interest in AI and machine learning conceptsImportant Information This is a freelance position compensated on an hourly basis. Please note that this is not an internship opportunity. Candidates must be authorized to work in their country of residence, and we do not offer sponsorship for this 1099 contract role. International students on a valid visa may be eligible to apply; however, specific circumstances should be discussed with a tax or immigration advisor. We are unable to provide employment documentation at this time. Compensation rates may vary for non-US locations.Pay Range (rate per hour)$15—$60 USDExcel in a remote-friendly hybrid model. We are dedicated to achieving excellence and recognize the importance of bringing our talented team together. While we continue to embrace remote work, we have transitioned to a hybrid model with a focus on nurturing collaboration and connection within our dedicated tech hubs in the San Francisco Bay Area, New York City Metro Area, and Wrocław, Poland. We encourage asynchronous communication, autonomy, and ownership of tasks, with the added convenience of hub-based gatherings.Your Personal Data Privacy: Any personal information you provide Labelbox as a part of your application will be processed in accordance with Labelbox’s Job Applicant Privacy notice.Any emails from Labelbox team members will originate from a @labelbox.com email address. If you encounter anything that raises suspicions during your interactions, we encourage you to exercise caution and suspend or discontinue communications. If you are uncertain about the legitimacy of any communication you have received, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at recruiting@labelbox.com for clarification and verification.
Requirements: Shape the future of AI in Genetics. This innovative role as an AI Trainer - Genetics offers a unique opportunity to leverage your subject-matter expertise and develop your AI skills. You will play a pivotal role in training AI models, ensuring the accuracy and relevance of Genetics content generated by AI. This position allows for flexible scheduling, and your contributions will directly impact the advancement of AI in Genetics., Enrolled in or have completed an Associates’ degree or higher from an accredited institution. Possess a strong writing style with excellent English-language spelling and grammar skills. Have a critical eye and the ability to clearly articulate the strengths and weaknesses of written text. Interest in AI and machine learning concepts

description: SummaryResilience, Inc. is a nonprofit organization that is dedicated to improving the mental health of students, as well as reducing mass shootings, suicide, and depression. Resilience, Inc also works to combat declining test scores, low student engagement, and a slew of other social issues. Our organization focuses on offering Social Emotional Learning tools to enable K-12 schools to teach emotional intelligence through five core topics; self-awareness, self-control, social awareness, relationship management, goal setting, and effective decision-making. Resilience, Inc. also provides tools for acquiring and maintaining inspiration, hope, and overall well-being. Our mission is to teach SEL at every school in the country. It is a tough challenge, but we know “No Challenge, No Change.” If you are also concerned about children’s mental health and social being, join us! Become a member of Resilience, Inc, and help change the way schools approach mental health. Resilience is looking for a Human Resources Project Manager and offering internship programs in the Human Resources department. Our internship programs are 90 hours with the option to continue after meeting the minimum requirement. We require at least a four month commitment, and have flexible start and end dates. Some previous projects Human Resource interns have worked on include Handshake and LinkedIn recruitment, scheduling and conducting interviews, and updating the onboarding process for Resilience, Inc. Interns will report to the Director of Human Resources. This internship is unpaid, but students may receive academic credit through their university. It is the responsibility of the student to check with their institute to be sure they meet any requirements before they accept the position. Essential Duties and Responsibilities Promote the social emotional curriculum through developing projects for the Human Resources department. Aid in the recruitment process by using Handshake and LinkedIn.Schedule and conduct interviews. Collaborate with other departments to determine hiring needs.Create reports detailing the amount of applicants, interviews, and hires. Qualifications Experience with remote production software, such as Zoom and Google Meet.Ability to work independently and as a team. Can attend weekly remote meetings with the Human Resources department. Have an eagerness to learn and improve critical skills. Good problem-solving skills.Learning OutcomeInterns will demonstrate an understanding of the recruitment process through Handshake and LinkedIn.Interns will gain the ability to collaborate with various different departments in order to improve the recruitment and onboarding process.Interns will improve their skills in creativity, communication, and critical thinking.

Schedule and conduct interviews. Collaborate with other departments to determine hiring needs. Create reports detailing the amount of applicants, interviews, and hires., Experience with remote production software, such as Zoom and Google Meet. Ability to work independently and as a team. Can attend weekly remote meetings with the Human Resources department. Have an eagerness to learn and improve critical skills. Good problem-solving skills.
requirements: SummaryResilience, Inc. is a nonprofit organization that is dedicated to improving the mental health of students, as well as reducing mass shootings, suicide, and depression. Resilience, Inc also works to combat declining test scores, low student engagement, and a slew of other social issues.  Our organization focuses on offering Social Emotional Learning tools to enable K-12 schools to teach emotional intelligence through five core topics; self-awareness, self-control, social awareness, relationship management, goal setting, and effective decision-making. Resilience, Inc. also provides tools for acquiring and maintaining inspiration, hope, and overall well-being.  Our mission is to teach SEL at every school in the country. It is a tough challenge, but we know “No Challenge, No Change.” If you are also concerned about children’s mental health and social being, join us! Become a member of Resilience, Inc, and help change the way schools approach mental health. Resilience is looking for a Human Resources Project Manager and offering internship programs in the Human Resources department. Our internship programs are 90 hours with the option to continue after meeting the minimum requirement. We require at least a four month commitment, and have flexible start and end dates. Some previous projects Human Resource interns have worked on include Handshake and LinkedIn recruitment, scheduling and conducting interviews, and updating the onboarding process for Resilience, Inc. Interns will report to the Director of Human Resources. This internship is unpaid, but students may receive academic credit through their university. It is the responsibility of the student to check with their institute to be sure they meet any requirements before they accept the position. Essential Duties and Responsibilities Promote the social emotional curriculum through developing projects for the Human Resources department. Aid in the recruitment process by using Handshake and LinkedIn.Schedule and conduct interviews. Collaborate with other departments to determine hiring needs.Create reports detailing the amount of applicants, interviews, and hires. Qualifications Experience with remote production software, such as Zoom and Google Meet.Ability to work independently and as a team. Can attend weekly remote meetings with the Human Resources department. Have an eagerness to learn and improve critical skills. Good problem-solving skills.Learning OutcomeInterns will demonstrate an understanding of the recruitment process through Handshake and LinkedIn.Interns will gain the ability to collaborate with various different departments in order to improve the recruitment and onboarding process.Interns will improve their skills in creativity, communication, and critical thinking.

description: Are you a recent college graduate interested in kickstarting your career? If so, this is the perfect opportunity for you! Partner with HR, Marketing, and Administration in this unique opportunity to contribute to a growing SaaS company in downtown Boston!Creatio is a global vendor of a platform designed to automate industry workflows and CRM with no-code, offering a maximum degree of freedom. With a global team of 700+ dedicated professionals, 700+ partners, and thousands of customers, Creatio operates in 100+ countries worldwide. The company has been highly recognized by key industry analysts, being included in seven Forrester Waves and five Gartner Magic Quadrants and recognized as a Leader in two of them.We are expanding our Americas-based team, headquartered in Boston, MA.The Opportunity:Are you ready to wear many hats and thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where each day presents new challenges and opportunities? We are seeking an enthusiastic and versatile Office and Executive Support Coordinator to join our HR team at our Boston headquarters. This full-time, in-person, salaried position is based at the beautiful 53 State Street office building, located in the heart of the city.As an Office and Executive Support Coordinator, you will play a pivotal role in supporting our growing team, gaining exposure to various departments, including Administration, Marketing, and HR. This unique opportunity is a great way to kickstart your career. If you're looking for a new opportunity to work at a fast-growing tech company and progress in your professional career, then this is the place for you!Responsibilities:The Office and Executive Support Coordinator will be required to consistently demonstrate the following:Order and maintain stock of office and kitchen supplies, including consumables (snacks, sodas, coffee, tea, etc.).Maintain the general upkeep of the office ensuring cleanliness and organization.Greet guests and facilitate meetings by coordinating the space, catering, and technical/AV support as appropriate.Coordinate office maintenance, repairs, and renovations when needed.Act as a main point of contact for the property management team and address any needs related to building operations.Manage the security of the office through communicating with the building security, sending visitor passes, and creating access badges for new employees.Provide access to building amenities by managing gym access and parking passes.Consistently check mail, scan, and send to appropriate parties.Assist with calendar management and scheduling meetings for C-suite executives.Respond to emails in a timely and professional manner.Coordinate executive lunches/dinners.Maintain Marketing, IT, and HR inventory, ordering new supplies when needed.Assist Marketing team with events, campaigns, and/or other tasks when needed.Work with the HR Team to ensure successful initiatives.Oversee FedEx, DHL, and UPS accounts to manage mail/package deliveries, working closely with the Marketing, HR/Admin, and IT Teams to support inbound and outbound, international, and domestic shipments.Requirements:College graduate with 0-1 years of administrative or office experience in a corporate environment.Ability to travel and work at our Boston office 5 days a week.Familiar with Microsoft Outlook, Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.Someone who is interested in learning and growing their professional career in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.Reliable and dependable.Ability to interact with internal staff and external visitors/partners in a professional and pleasant manner.Enthusiastic individual with the ability to effectively juggle shifting priorities.A positive mindset and willingness to help others.What you should expect from us:Powerful award-winning product: Creatio is recognized as a Leader and Strong Performer by Gartner and Forrester.Collaborative environment: Our corporate culture encourages the exchange of experience and knowledge, readiness to help, and mentoring.Limitless opportunities for career development: We organize plenty of external and internal training. Each employee has an individual professional and career growth plan.Other essential benefits: health insurance, paid vacation, and sick leave.You will report directly to Olivia Hourihan (HR Director), https://www.linkedin.com/in/olivia-hourihan-shrm-cp/

description: Do you want to create original and compelling promotional content for a rapidly scaling AI App? We are looking for talented and motivated graphic design interns to help create professional marketing images to use in digital marketing, for the press, and on our social media channels. You will have the opportunity to work closely with Alias leadership, make your creative vision a reality and be involved in a product launch. This is a remote job to be performed on a part time schedule that fits with your studies. This internship is UNPAID but prior interns have been able to obtian class credit.Please familiarize yourself with our product before applying. Our app is available in the Apple App Store and Google Play - download here https://app.befakeai.com/join/We would love to hear about your experience creating professional and original content when applying.Skills that matter most for this role:Basic graphic design skills and the ability to create professional quality designsA creative mindset and an entrepreneurial spirit, with a high sense of responsibility and initiativeAn affinity and desire to learn and apply a new range of skillsPassionate about the BeFake AppHere is a short promotional video which gives you an idea of how we have positioned the app so far: https://youtu.be/1Gt9heGlg18 – however we are in the process of creating V2 of the app which will be released by the end of September and have exciting new changes.We hope to hear from you!-The Alias Team

job_title: Sales and Marketing Position is Open
description: Hello! Thank you for taking time to review this opportunity.Company Overview: The Creative Bomb is a leading mobile app and web development company specializing in innovative and custom app/web solutions for businesses of all sizes. We are committed to delivering high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications that drive business growth and enhance user experiences.Location: RemoteOverview: This is a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in sales and marketing earning a base salary of $500 per month while earning commission for every successful lead or sale you generate. We are seeking a motivated and dynamic Sales and Marketing Intern to join our team on a commission-only basis. If you are a self-starter with a passion for technology and a knack for sales, we want to hear from you!Responsibilities:Identify and generate new business opportunities through various channels (e.g., social media, phone calls, email campaigns, networking events).Conduct market research to identify potential clients and industries for our mobile app development services.Reach out to potential clients to present our services and identify their needs.Track and report on sales performance, including leads generated, sales closed, and commissions earned.Base Salary: We offer a base salary of $500 per monthCommission Structure:Earn a competitive commission for each successful lead or sale. This means even generating an incoming email to The Creative Bomb that leads into a sale, you are paid the commission.Our sales range between $5,000 and $250,000 per project acquired.Commission structure:10% commission on sales.Commission example:Your lead generates a $50,000 sale, you earn $5,000.Learning Opportunities:Gain hands-on experience in sales and marketing within the tech industry.Develop valuable skills in lead generation, client relationship management, and sales strategy.Opportunity to work closely with experienced professionals and receive mentorship.Expand your professional network within the tech and startup community.Qualifications:Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a relevant degree program (e.g., Business, Marketing, Communications).Strong interest in sales and marketing within the tech industry.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Self-motivated with a strong work ethic and ability to work independently.Basic understanding of mobile app/web development is a plus but not required.Work Hours:Flexible work hours with a minimum commitment of 20 hours per week.Remote position, allowing you to work from anywhere.Duration:1-month internship with the possibility of extension based on performance and mutual agreement. Open to negotiation.
Requirements: Identify and generate new business opportunities through various channels (e.g., social media, phone calls, email campaigns, networking events). Conduct market research to identify potential clients and industries for our mobile app development services. Reach out to potential clients to present our services and identify their needs. Track and report on sales performance, including leads generated, sales closed, and commissions earned., Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a relevant degree program (e.g., Business, Marketing, Communications). Strong interest in sales and marketing within the tech industry. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Self-motivated with a strong work ethic and ability to work independently. Basic understanding of mobile app/web development is a plus but not required.

job_title: Global Business Operation Specialist【Only for non-Chinese students studying in China】
description: Responsibilities:1. Responsible for the daily operations of Trip's flight global business, ensuring the normal operation of various market resources; assist in establishing operational rules and promote the implementation and achievement of operational plans.2. Monitor and analyze competitor information, ensure the effectiveness and visualization of competitor data collection, and assist in formulating business plans and strategies.3. Coordinate with product, technology, marketing, and customer service departments to handle and resolve unexpected issues, ensuring smooth workflow.4. Work closely with the overseas sales team to ensure timely maintenance and implementation of products, and accurately understand product rules and policies.5. Communicate smoothly and work closely with airline partners, and timely collect and update relevant policies. We Expect You To:1. Have excellent business data analysis skills, capable of using Excel, Python, SQL, etc., for data analysis, mining, and visualization.2. Possess strong writing skills, be familiar with internet products, and have a passion for the travel industry.3. Have excellent project management abilities, strong execution skills, a sense of responsibility, and problem-solving capabilities.4. Demonstrate strong learning ability and work initiative, able to drive project execution and implementation.5. Have excellent communication and coordination skills, able to effectively collaborate with team members and other departments.6. Be familiar with the local culture.7. Language Requirements: Native proficiency in the local language, and able to use Chinese and English as daily working languages.

description: Job Title: Digital Marketing Intern - UnpaidLocation: RemoteAbout Us:Find Me is an innovative startup focused on creating cutting-edge applications. We are currently in the designing phase and gearing up to launch our product soon. Our team is passionate about technology and driven to make a difference in the IT field. Located in the United States, we offer remote work flexibility to our team members.Desired Qualifications:We are seeking a creative and data-driven Digital Marketing Intern with the following skills and qualifications:• Familiarity with digital marketing tools and platforms such as Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and other social media marketing tools.• Experience with SEO, content marketing, and email marketing strategies.• Understanding of social media platforms and how to engage audiences across channels (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.).• Strong writing skills with the ability to craft engaging and persuasive content.• Knowledge of digital advertising strategies and trends.• Familiarity with marketing analytics and reporting to track and optimize campaigns.• Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.• A startup mindset with the ability to work independently and adapt to fast-paced environments.Responsibilities:As a Digital Marketing Intern at Find Me, you will:• Assist in the creation and execution of digital marketing campaigns to promote Find Me’s products and brand.• Develop content for social media platforms, email marketing campaigns, and other digital channels.• Help optimize website content for SEO, driving traffic and improving search engine rankings.• Analyze performance data from digital marketing campaigns and provide insights and recommendations for improvement.• Manage social media accounts, engage with followers, and grow online presence.• Conduct market research to identify digital marketing trends and opportunities.• Assist with paid advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads and social media.• Collaborate with the design team to create visuals and multimedia content for marketing efforts.Benefits:• Gain hands-on experience in digital marketing within a startup environment.• Opportunity to earn academic credits.• Chance to convert this internship into a full-time role based on performance.• Work with a dynamic and innovative team in a fast-growing startup.How to Apply:To apply, please send your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you’re excited about this opportunity to hr@fyndme.net. We look forward to seeing your work and how you can contribute to the future of Find Me’s digital presence. Requirements: Job Title: Digital Marketing Intern - UnpaidLocation: RemoteAbout Us:Find Me is an innovative startup focused on creating cutting-edge applications. We are currently in the designing phase and gearing up to launch our product soon. Our team is passionate about technology and driven to make a difference in the IT field. Located in the United States, we offer remote work flexibility to our team members.Desired Qualifications:We are seeking a creative and data-driven Digital Marketing Intern with the following skills and qualifications:• Familiarity with digital marketing tools and platforms such as Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and other social media marketing tools.• Experience with SEO, content marketing, and email marketing strategies.• Understanding of social media platforms and how to engage audiences across channels (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.).• Strong writing skills with the ability to craft engaging and persuasive content.• Knowledge of digital advertising strategies and trends.• Familiarity with marketing analytics and reporting to track and optimize campaigns.• Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.• A startup mindset with the ability to work independently and adapt to fast-paced environments.Responsibilities:As a Digital Marketing Intern at Find Me, you will:• Assist in the creation and execution of digital marketing campaigns to promote Find Me’s products and brand.• Develop content for social media platforms, email marketing campaigns, and other digital channels.• Help optimize website content for SEO, driving traffic and improving search engine rankings.• Analyze performance data from digital marketing campaigns and provide insights and recommendations for improvement.• Manage social media accounts, engage with followers, and grow online presence.• Conduct market research to identify digital marketing trends and opportunities.• Assist with paid advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads and social media.• Collaborate with the design team to create visuals and multimedia content for marketing efforts.Benefits:• Gain hands-on experience in digital marketing within a startup environment.• Opportunity to earn academic credits.• Chance to convert this internship into a full-time role based on performance.• Work with a dynamic and innovative team in a fast-growing startup.How to Apply:To apply, please send your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you’re excited about this opportunity to hr@fyndme.net. We look forward to seeing your work and how you can contribute to the future of Find Me’s digital presence.  Note: This is an unpaid internship with the possibility of academic credits and a potential full-time position based on performance.

description: Skillset RequirementsEducation: A minimum of a high school diploma is required. Additional qualifications, such as certifications or a degree in a relevant field, are an advantage.Experience: While previous experience in an administrative or assistant role is preferred, it is not mandatory. Fresh graduates with relevant internships or part-time work experience are welcome to apply.Organizational Skills: Strong ability to prioritize tasks, manage time efficiently, and handle multiple assignments simultaneously, while maintaining attention to detail.Communication: Outstanding verbal and written communication skills, with the capability to engage professionally with colleagues at all levels and external stakeholders.Technical Proficiency: Proficient in using common office software (such as the Microsoft Office Suite) and able to quickly adapt to new software and tools.Discretion and Confidentiality: Proven ability to manage sensitive information with discretion, diplomacy, and confidentiality.Problem-Solving Skills: Excellent analytical skills, with the ability to identify problems and devise effective solutions.Adaptability and Flexibility: A readiness to take on new tasks and adjust to changing priorities in a dynamic work environment.Team Collaboration: Strong teamwork skills, with the ability to work well in diverse teams and contribute to a positive and supportive work atmosphere.Professionalism: Consistently maintain a professional attitude, demonstrate a proactive and positive approach, and uphold high standards of integrity.BenefitHands-on Experience: Gain practical, real-world experience working closely with professionals and executives.Skill Development: Enhance organizational, communication, problem-solving, and multitasking skills.Networking Opportunities: Connect and build relationships with experienced professionals in the industry.Resume Builder: Add valuable internship experience to your resume, showcasing your abilities and commitment to growth.Academic Credit: Earn academic credit while integrating practical experience with your studies.References and Recommendations: Secure strong references and recommendations for future job prospects.Industry Exposure: Gain firsthand knowledge and understanding of the relevant industry or field.Personal Growth: Challenge yourself, develop resilience, and foster personal development and confidence. PackageUnpaid internship, with the receipt of academic creditHow to Apply: https://forms.gle/MZqwYrrPMBbWUFXo7
