skills: Skillset Requirements

description: At Qualtrics, we create software the world’s best brands use to deliver exceptional frontline experiences, build high-performing teams, and design products people love. But we are more than a platform—we are the creators and stewards of the Experience Management category serving over 18K clients globally. Building a category takes grit, determination, and a disdain for convention—but most of all it requires close-knit, high-functioning teams with an unwavering dedication to serving our customers.When you join one of our teams, you’ll be part of a nimble group that’s empowered to set aggressive goals and move fast to achieve them. Strategic risks are encouraged and complex problems are solved together, by passing the mic and iterating until the best solution comes to light. You won’t have to look to find growth opportunities—ready or not, they’ll find you. From retail to government to healthcare, we’re on a mission to bring humanity, connection, and empathy back to business. Join over 6,000 people across the globe who think that’s work worth doing.Product SpecialistWhy We Have This RoleQualtrics leads the way in Experience Management—one of the fastest-growing tech categories—as a Product Specialist you will be at the forefront of this global movement.How You’ll Find SuccessBecome the technical subject-matter expert on the Qualtrics platformDeliver exceptional customer experiencesTake initiative and get things done to achieve resolution for our customersWork well in teams - partnering with managers, cross functional teams, and teammatesDemonstrate a growth mindset and a bias for continuous improvementHow You’ll GrowYour analytical skills are critical as you respond to clients (including Fortune 500 employees, tenured professors, and small business owners) via phone, email, or chatThe one constant about Qualtrics is progress - you regularly adapt and learn as our products and technologies changeWe have an open office environment here at Qualtrics, so you collaborate with fellow product specialists to find solutions for both our customers and our processesHelp companies achieve their business/company goals, through your exceptional troubleshooting and technical expertiseImprove your qualifications/technical skills (HTML, Javascript, CSS)Learn more about a day in the life of our Product Specialists.Things You’ll DoUse your analytical and problem solving skills to respond to technical support needsWork with customers ranging from grad students to Chief Marketing OfficersHelp companies from startups to the Fortune 500 across all industries identify solutions to achieve their business goalsConstantly learn and adapt as our products and technologies changeWork with your team to solve customer questions in an in-office environment three days a weekWhat We’re Looking For On YourResumeMinimum Requirements:Bachelor’s degree from a top university.Hard-working self-starterExcellent analytical skills.Ability to communicate and teach complicated concepts.Detail-orientation with an ability to prioritize and meet deadlines.Interest in Technology/SaaS industry.Preferred Requirements:Technical or hard science major or minor.Prior instructing, research, or tutoring experience.Coding classes and/or coding skills (MATLAB, R, Python, VB, Java, CSS, HTML, etc.).What You Should Know About This TeamYou’ll know you are a top performer when you consistently receive top satisfaction scores from our clients.You’ll become an authority in the Qualtrics product, which will ensure you can effectively help our customers with a mix of instructing and troubleshooting.Our Team’s Favorite Perks and BenefitsCompetitive salary, performance bonuses, generous 401(k) MatchWellness Reimbursement for $300 per quarter for wellness activities including gym memberships, spa massages, workout equipment, meditation apps, and much more.$1800 Experience bonus to be used for an “Experience” of your choosingUnlimited Sick DaysAmazing QGroup Communities; MOSAIQ, Green Team, Qualtrics Pride, Q&Able, Qualtrics Salute, and Women’s Leadership Development, which exist as places for support, allyship, and advocacy.Free food and drinks, massage chairs, table tennis, an onsite gym and more The Qualtrics Hybrid Work Model: Our hybrid work model is elegantly simple: we all gather in the office three days a week; Mondays and Thursdays, plus one day selected by your organizational leader. These purposeful in-person days in thoughtfully designed offices help us do our best work and harness the power of collaboration and innovation. For the rest of the week, work where you want, owning the integration of work and life.Qualtrics is an equal opportunity employer meaning that all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, status as a protected veteran, or any other protected characteristic.​​​​​​​Applicants in the United States of America have rights under Federal Employment Laws:Family & Medical Leave Act,Equal Opportunity Employment,Employee Polygraph Protection ActQualtrics is committed to the inclusion of all qualified individuals. As part of this commitment, Qualtrics will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided with reasonable accommodations. If reasonable accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and/or to receive other benefits and privileges of employment, please let your Qualtrics contact/recruiter know.Not finding a role that’s the right fit for now? Qualtrics Insiders is the one-stop shop for all things Qualtrics Life. Sign up for exclusive access to content created with you in mind and get the scoop on what we have going on at Qualtrics - upcoming events, behind the scenes stories from the team, interview tips, hot jobs, and more. No spam - we promise! You'll hear from us two times a month max with fresh, totally tailored info - so be sure to stay connected as you explore your best role and company fit.#university #quni #wayup
Requirements: Qualtrics leads the way in Experience Management—one of the fastest-growing tech categories—as a Product Specialist you will be at the forefront of this global movement., Minimum Requirements: Bachelor’s degree from a top university. Hard-working self-starter Excellent analytical skills. Ability to communicate and teach complicated concepts. Detail-orientation with an ability to prioritize and meet deadlines. Interest in Technology/SaaS industry. Preferred Requirements: Technical or hard science major or minor. Prior instructing, research, or tutoring experience. Coding classes and/or coding skills (MATLAB, R, Python, VB, Java, CSS, HTML, etc.).

job_title: Marketing Intern - Social Media Associate - Remote
description: Available Internship Role: Social Media Associate - RemoteAbout Us:PureMaven is a SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) and marketplace company focusing on the wellness, personal care, and beauty space. We work with top health and wellness providers and professionals across the United States and internationally to bring personal care services to their clients around the world. We bring the unique intersection of human touch and technology to the wellness, personal care, and beauty industry.About the Role:We are looking for an enthusiastic Marketing Intern - Social Media Associate to join our team. Please refer to the job description below. Thank you! We look forward to seeing your application.Team PureMaven---Role Overview:As a PureMaven Marketing Intern - Social Media Associate, you will collaborate with us across our marketing, advertising, and promotional programs, as well as work with our clients. The PureMaven Marketing Internship Program will help you acquire marketing skills and provide you with knowledge of various marketing strategies, technology, and tools. PureMaven’s founders have extensive marketing, product management, and technology experience, and you’ll be part of an exciting team that’s going to revolutionize how we all do self-care. Our ideal candidate is proactive, results-driven, creative, has strong communication skills, and is passionate about technology and the beauty services industry. The intern must be a self-starter who is curious and eager to learn how to be a part of a successful, high-growth business. Ultimately, you will have responsibilities you can sink your teeth into with much creative input, gain broad experience in marketing and technology, and acquire core marketing, project management, and analytics skills.Puremaven interns receive a degree of development and coaching that is unmatched in the industry:Our internships are designed to give interns the type of experience of a Marketing Associate with 1-2 years of post-undergraduate working experience. This allows them to develop core marketing, research, analytics, and project management skills applicable to a variety of roles.Our interns are able to successfully fulfill these responsibilities since they directly report to and are coached by a senior member of the executive team. While most interns report to a manager with 1-4 years of experience, our interns work directly with our executives, all of whom are seasoned professionals with 15+ years of senior leadership experience.Responsibilities: Support, collaborate, and/or take the lead in the following areas:Create omni-channel marketing and advertising campaigns to build up PureMaven’s social media presence in line with PureMaven’s brand values and voiceHandle graphic projects from start to finish, creating eye-catching videos, graphics, and engaging designs for use on social media platforms and websitesManage email marketing campaigns and social media advertisingCoordinate with Head of Marketing to develop, implement, and manage our social media calendar & strategyAttending external events and associated conferencesMonitoring SEO, Google Analytics, user engagement, and content optimizationDefining social media KPIs and measuring the success of each social media campaign & accountManage and produce email blasts, Newsletters, and blogOrganize and deliver marketing and corporate events with top clientsResearch and manage outreach to potential brand partnersRequirements:Strong desire to learn and collaborate with othersProactive and takes the initiative to identify and act on opportunities to help the teamPositive and team player attitude, with a strong commitment to excellenceA multi-tasker with excellent interpersonal and verbal & written communication skillsPassion for the health, beauty, and wellness industryCurrently enrolled in a related BS or Master’s degreePrevious experience in graphic design, social media management, and/or marketingKnowledge of design, and video/photo/content editing software (e.g., Adobe Creative Cloud Suite)Excellent team player with multitasking, communication, and time-management skillsCritical thinker and problem-solving skillsAutonomous individual with visionary ideas to help build the brand and ministryMust work well alone and in a team environmentMust have a creative eyeDeadline and detail-orientedPassion for and experience with social media platforms, e.g., TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, etc.This role is unpaid but eligible for expense reimbursementPosition is remote for the majority of the time; some in-person time may be required on a case-by-case basis, particularly for special marketing events15-19 hours/week for 4+ monthsApplicants are required during the interview process to verify with their university (e.g., academic advisor, internship coordinator) that they are eligible to obtain academic credit for the internship program and that the position satisfies the criteria for receiving academic credit15-19 hours/week for 4+ monthsThis position complies with the Fair Labor Standard Act. Job ID 2024-MG-SM

job_title: AI Trainer for Probability & Statistics (Freelance, Remote)
description: Alignerr.com is a community of subject matter experts from several disciplines who align AI models by creating high-quality data in their field of expertise to build the future of Generative AI. Alignerr is operated by Labelbox. Labelbox is the leading data-centric AI platform for building intelligent applications. Teams looking to capitalize on the latest advances in generative AI and LLMs use the Labelbox platform to inject these systems with the right degree of human supervision and automation. Whether they are building AI products by using LLMs that require human fine-tuning, or applying AI to reduce the time associated with manually-intensive tasks like data labeling or finding business insights, Labelbox enables teams to do so effectively and quickly.Current Labelbox customers are transforming industries within insurance, retail, manufacturing/robotics, healthcare, and beyond. Our platform is used by Fortune 500 enterprises including Walmart, Procter & Gamble, Genentech, and Adobe, as well as hundreds of leading AI teams. We are backed by leading investors including SoftBank, Andreessen Horowitz, B Capital, Gradient Ventures (Google's AI-focused fund), Databricks Ventures, Snowpoint Ventures and Kleiner Perkins.About the Role Shape the future of AI in Probability & Statistics. This innovative role as an AI Trainer - Probability & Statistics offers a unique opportunity to leverage your subject-matter expertise and develop your AI skills. You will play a pivotal role in training AI models, ensuring the accuracy and relevance of Probability & Statistics content generated by AI. This position allows for flexible scheduling, and your contributions will directly impact the advancement of AI in Probability & Statistics.Your Day to Day Educate AI: Analyze and provide feedback on AI-generated outputs related to Probability & Statistics. Your guidance will directly improve the AI's accuracy and ability to apply its knowledge to real-world problems.Problem Solving: Using your expertise, you will provide step-by-step solutions and explanations to complex problems in Probability & Statistics. Your input will be crucial in teaching the AI how to reason through these problems effectively.Red Teaming: Utilize your deep understanding of the field to identify potential biases, limitations, or inaccuracies in the AI's knowledge base. Design and conduct tests that push the boundaries of the model's understanding, ensuring its outputs are reliable and applicable to real-world scenarios.You create your own working hours depending on project length.About You Enrolled in or have completed an Associates’ degree or higher from an accredited institution.Possess a strong writing style with excellent English-language spelling and grammar skills.Have a critical eye and the ability to clearly articulate the strengths and weaknesses of written text.Interest in AI and machine learning conceptsImportant Information This is a freelance position compensated on an hourly basis. Please note that this is not an internship opportunity. Candidates must be authorized to work in their country of residence, and we do not offer sponsorship for this 1099 contract role. International students on a valid visa may be eligible to apply; however, specific circumstances should be discussed with a tax or immigration advisor. We are unable to provide employment documentation at this time. Compensation rates may vary for non-US locations.Pay Range (rate per hour)$15—$60 USDExcel in a remote-friendly hybrid model.We are dedicated to achieving excellence and recognize the importance of bringing our talented team together. While we continue to embrace remote work, we have transitioned to a hybrid model with a focus on nurturing collaboration and connection within our dedicated tech hubs in the San Francisco Bay Area, New York City Metro Area, and Wrocław, Poland. We encourage asynchronous communication, autonomy, and ownership of tasks, with the added convenience of hub-based gatherings.Your Personal Data Privacy: Any personal information you provide Labelbox as a part of your application will be processed in accordance with Labelbox’s Job Applicant Privacy notice.Any emails from Labelbox team members will originate from a @labelbox.com email address. If you encounter anything that raises suspicions during your interactions, we encourage you to exercise caution and suspend or discontinue communications. If you are uncertain about the legitimacy of any communication you have received, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at recruiting@labelbox.com for clarification and verification.

This position allows for flexible scheduling, and your contributions will directly impact the advancement of AI in Probability & Statistics., Enrolled in or have completed an Associates’ degree or higher from an accredited institution. description: Job Summary:Resilience, Inc. is a nonprofit organization that is dedicated to improving the mental health of students, as well as reducing mass shootings, suicide, and depression. Resilience, Inc also works to combat declining test scores, low student engagement, and a slew of other social issues. Our organization focuses on offering Social Emotional Learning tools to enable K-12 schools to teach emotional intelligence through five core topics; self-awareness, self-control, social awareness, relationship management, goal setting, and effective decision-making. Resilience, Inc. also provides tools for acquiring and maintaining inspiration, hope, and overall well-being. Our mission is to teach SEL at every school in the country. It is a tough challenge, but we know “No Challenge, No Change.” If you are also concerned about children’s mental health and social being, join us! Become a member of Resilience, Inc, and help change the way schools approach mental health. Resilience offers unpaid internship programs that require at least a 4 month commitment with a minimum of 5 hours per week. There are flexible start and end dates with the option to continue after meeting the minimum requirement Although this is an unpaid internship, there is the opportunity to earn school credit. Some educational institutions require prior approval before the start of an internship. It is the responsibility of the student to check with their institution to be sure they meet any requirements before they accept a position. As a Social Media Project Manager with Resilience, you will have the unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in the world of nonprofit grant writing and fundraising. You will work closely with our team to support our grants and donation solicitation efforts, helping to secure essential funding for our organization's mission.Requirements:Strong graphic design skills, with the ability to spot design mistakes.Proficient in using ChatGPT for pitching social media prompts, captions, and hashtags.Strong organizational skills to pitch monthly social media calendar tasks and keep up with the dates.Strong communication skills, capable of negotiating with designers when needed.Flexible work hours to approve, revise, and post according to designers' submissions.Bachelor’s degree in Psychology, Marketing, Business, English, Communications or a related area (preferred).Note: This internship offers a unique chance to be part of a meaningful project that positively impacts the lives of refugees. While the position is unpaid, it provides valuable experience in project management, social impact initiatives, and collaboration with diverse teams. You will have the opportunity to contribute to a noble cause and enhance your skills in a real-world setting.
Requirements: Strong graphic design skills, with the ability to spot design mistakes. Proficient in using ChatGPT for pitching social media prompts, captions, and hashtags. Strong organizational skills to pitch monthly social media calendar tasks and keep up with the dates. Strong communication skills, capable of negotiating with designers when needed. Flexible work hours to approve, revise, and post according to designers' submissions. Bachelor’s degree in Psychology, Marketing, Business, English, Communications or a related area (preferred). Note: This internship offers a unique chance to be part of a meaningful project that positively impacts the lives of refugees. While the position is unpaid, it provides valuable experience in project management, social impact initiatives, and collaboration with diverse teams. You will have the opportunity to contribute to a noble cause and enhance your skills in a real-world setting.

description: AT Worthy Technology Inc. pioneers the "Digital Worthiness" concept, which underpins our AI-powered rating system, offering brands a comprehensive grade from 1 to 5 @s to elevate their digital presence and enhance customer decision-making. We are dedicated to enabling brands to optimize their digital strategies and provide a superior digitally enabled experience. We are looking for a Digital Marketing Intern ( Unpaid position ) to join our team during the summer. The ideal candidate needs to be a motivated self-starter and eager to succeed in executing revenue-generation campaigns. Duties and Responsibilities:Assist in creating and implementing social media marketing strategies to enhance the company's online presence and engagementContribute to the development and maintenance of the company's brand identity across various digital platformsConduct research to identify potential business opportunities, partnerships, and collaborations that align with the company's goalsCollaborate with the management team to create compelling and effective advertising content for various campaigns and initiativesAssist in analyzing marketing data and trends to optimize marketing strategies and enhance the company's visibility in the marketSupport the team in various administrative and organizational tasks related to marketing and brand developmentStay updated with the latest trends and best practices in social media and digital marketing Qualifications:Understanding of basic principles of user experience to contribute ideas for improving website navigation, layout, and overall user satisfaction.Ability to collect and analyze user feedback from reviews and comments, providing insights to enhance the user experience and address concerns.Basic knowledge of advertising concepts, including different ad formats, target audience segmentation, and campaign objectives.Strong organizational and project planning skills to assist in coordinating marketing campaigns, ensuring timelines are met and tasks are executed efficiently.Ability to work in a dynamic environment in which the requirements are fast-changingExcellent writing/editing and verbal communication skillsComfortable with remote work with global teamsNice to have:Familiarity with basic HTML and CSS coding to make minor adjustments and formatting changes on web pages.Familiarity with AI toolsWhat we offer:A start-up where you can learn and soarA high degree of autonomyMulti-cultural environmentTransparency & Open CultureEmail : career@atworthy.com

description: Job descriptionExciting Opportunity to Teach Coding to Elementary and Middle School Students$20 - $$30 daily bonus for teaching in person!Build on programming skills in the classroom while gaining experience in presentation and communication, adaptability, and problem solving. Learn and grow with us as you complete your education!Apply directly at: https://cwk.us/apply/instructorAre you passionate about coding and eager to inspire the next generation of tech-savvy innovators? Look no further! Join our dynamic team as a Coding Instructor for K - 2nd grade Summer Camp programs and embark on a rewarding journey of empowering young minds through the world of programming. Our program is hiring primarily those interested in Elementary School in person classes ready to teach our most popular classes in Scratch, Python, Robotics, Minecraft Modding, Roblox Development, Web Dev, and more!Why Join Us?At Coding with Kids, we're more than just an academy – we're a community dedicated to fostering creativity, critical thinking, and confidence in students aged 5-18. As an instructor, you'll play a pivotal role in shaping future leaders in technology while enjoying the flexibility of part-time hours.What You'll Do:Lead engaging and interactive coding classes in-person at local schools, primarily during after-school hours in the fall, winter, and spring session and camps style during the summer.Work within a 30 minute drive radius of your home at a variety of after school placements. Each placement will be at the same site, once a week, for roughly 8 weeks at a time.Utilize our comprehensive curriculum (flexible for customization) to teach scratch in person and a variety of coding programming languages available onlineCreate a positive and supportive learning environment for students, igniting their passion for technology.Foster strong relationships with fellow instructors and students, building a vibrant community of learners.Hours: Ranging from 5 - 20 hours per week with a mix of in person and online classes. Teaching in person is a required part of this position in any of our major regions of Austin, TX Denver / Boulder, CO, Portland, OR, Seattle, WA, Central Maryland (mostly along I-95 to Rockville), DC, Fairfax, VA, and Phoenix, AZ.Who We're Looking For:If you have a love for coding, experience working with children or youth, and a reliable vehicle to get to and from class, you're exactly who we need! Whether you're a seasoned programmer or a coding enthusiast eager to share your knowledge, we welcome diverse backgrounds and skill levels.What We Offer:Well-structured curriculum and comprehensive training to prepare you for success.Supportive network of passionate instructors committed to making a difference.Opportunities for bonuses based on student retention, customer feedback, and class completion.Classes are starting soon, so don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to inspire young minds and earn competitive pay doing what you love! Apply now at:https://cwk.us/apply/instructorJoin us in shaping the future of technology!
Requirements: If you have a love for coding, experience working with children or youth, and a reliable vehicle to get to and from class, you're exactly who we need! Whether you're a seasoned programmer or a coding enthusiast eager to share your knowledge, we welcome diverse backgrounds and skill levels.

job_title: Content Writer Intern - Sustainability Eco-Game Startup - VC Backed
description: Are You:● Passionate about Sustainability and Climate Change?● Interested in Virtual Worlds and Gaming?● Want to be rewarded for living sustainably?● Want to get experience working for a venture-backed, fast-growing startup and get in on the ground floor● Do you want to support the creation of world-class, cutting-edge technology?● Do you have a passion for writing good content? Yes? Then come join us at Tanbii!● We think you’re fantastic.● We think building eco-gaming software to increase human agency is good.● We also think it’s good business! What is Tanbii?● Tanbii is a planet-impact universe that bridges the real and virtual worlds for a greener planet. Reduce carbon in the real world, and get rewarded in the virtual world. We financially incentivize people to reduce personal carbon emissions in a simple, fun, and safe way. Reduce to earn. At the same, we help brands to reduce waste and generate more revenues. It’s a win-win for everyone.● Eco-Gaming is a concept created by Tanbii that bridges the gap between real and virtual worlds. The carbon emission you reduce in the real world helps you get rewarded in the virtual world. RESPONSIBILITIESKey Responsibilities:Collaborate with the creative team to develop new storylines, characters, and quests that fit within Tanbii's universe.Assist in expanding and refining the existing game narrative to maintain continuity and depth.Craft compelling dialogue, descriptions, and world-building elements that engage players and bring the game world to life.Contribute to the creation of game scripts, lore, backstory, and in-game events.Conduct research to ensure storylines align with environmental sustainability themes and Web3 concepts.Participate in brainstorming sessions to generate creative ideas and innovative narrative structures. What We’re Looking For:Currently pursuing a degree in Creative Writing, English, Game Design, or related field.A strong passion for storytelling and narrative development, especially in the context of games.Excellent creative writing skills with the ability to adapt tone and style to fit different characters and scenarios.An understanding of game mechanics, player motivation, and how narrative integrates into gameplay.Interest or experience in Web3, GameFi, or environmental sustainability is a plus.Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.Enthusiasm for gaming and a deep understanding of RPGs, open-world, or narrative-driven games. What You’ll Gain:Hands-on experience working with a team of industry professionals on a cutting-edge Web3 GameFi project.Opportunity to develop your creative writing and storytelling skills in a real-world game development environment.The chance to contribute to a game that has a positive environmental impact and reach a global audience.Mentorship from experienced game developers and content creators.Potential for growth and future opportunities in the game development and Web3 sectors.Reduce your carbon footprint and be the savior of our planet!For our best student interns, this is a pathway to a full-time role upon graduation!!【SUBMISSION】Send your resume and role applied to BagaDS directly at our Discord (https://discord.gg/SfRcazT4vb)

description: Resilience, Inc. is a nonprofit organization that is dedicated to improving the mental health of students, as well as reducing mass shootings, suicide, and depression. Resilience, Inc. also works to combat declining test scores, low student engagement, and a slew of other social issues. Our organization focuses on offering Social Emotional Learning tools to enable K-12 schools to teach emotional intelligence through 5 core topics: self-awareness, self-control, social awareness, relationship management, goal setting & effective decision-making. We also provide tools for acquiring and maintaining inspiration, hope, social beings, and overall well-being. Our mission is to teach SEL tools at every school in the country. It is a tough challenge, but we know “No Challenge, No Change.” If you are also concerned about children’s mental health and social well-being, join us! Become a member of Resilience, Inc. and help change the way schools approach mental health. Resilience offers unpaid internship programs that require at least a 4-month commitment with a minimum of 5 hours per week and team meetings weekly. Availability must also allow for as-needed meetings/phone calls. There are flexible start and end dates with the option to continue after meeting the minimum requirement. Assist the SG&C Director to prepare reports; needs assessments; and evaluations, related to the Resilience’s self-governance activities; support in documenting import/export processes and procedures; aid in ensuring that all staff members are offboarded, according to Resilience’s policies and procedures. (Employee Offboarding) Activities:Audit the following items on a weekly and/or monthly basis -Conduct Quarterly & Annual Audits (Finance & Accounting Division)-Monthly Payroll File Audit (Tracking Approved Hours)-Weekly Timesheet Submission Audits-Weekly hours worked Audit (minimum of 5 hours)

job_title: International Finance Trainee（Only for non-Chinese students）
description: You will be responsible for:1. Assist global corporate development activities, including but not limited to global partnership, investment, acquisition and post-investment monitoring;2. Facilitate the communication between headquarter and overseas partners to advance the localization of finance technology, service, supply chain, marketing and sales;3. Conduct research and analysis on global value chain partner and target market;4. Administrative assistance to the corporate development team;5. Other Ad-hoc tacks assigned from time to time.We expect you to:1. Bachelor’s degree or above；2. Native Korean and advanced business English is a must;3. Strong working knowledge in financial & accounting and modeling skill;4. Logical, analytical and critical thinking;5. Well-organized and strong attention to details;6. Multi-tasking and ability to prioritize.

description: Available Internship Role: Marketing & Growth Intern - RemoteAbout Us:PureMaven is a SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) and marketplace company focusing on the health and wellness space. We work with top health and wellness providers and professionals across the United States and internationally to bring personal care services to their clients around the world. We bring the unique intersection of human touch and technology to the health and wellness industry.About the Role:We are looking for an enthusiastic Marketing & Growth Intern to join our team. Please refer to the job description below.Thank you! We look forward to seeing your application.Team PureMaven---Role Overview:As a PureMaven Marketing Intern, you will collaborate with us across our marketing, advertising, and promotional programs, as well as work with our clients. The PureMaven Marketing Internship Program will help you acquire marketing skills and provide you with knowledge of various marketing strategies, technology, and tools. PureMaven’s founders have extensive marketing, product management, and technology experience, and you’ll be part of an exciting team that’s going to revolutionize how we all do self-care. Our ideal candidate is proactive, results-driven, creative, has strong communication skills, and is passionate about health, wellness, and technology. The intern must be a self-starter who is curious and eager to learn how to be a part of a successful, high-growth business. Ultimately, you will have responsibilities you can sink your teeth into with much creative input, gain broad experience in marketing and technology, and acquire core marketing, project management, and analytics skills.Puremaven interns receive a degree of development and coaching that is unmatched in the industry:Our internships are designed to give interns the type of experience of a Marketing Associate with 1-2 years of post-undergraduate working experience. This allows them to develop core marketing, research, analytics, and project management skills applicable to a variety of roles.Our interns are able to successfully fulfill these responsibilities since they directly report to and are coached by a senior member of the executive team. While most interns report to a manager with 1-4 years of experience, our interns work directly with our executives, all of whom are seasoned professionals with 15+ years of senior leadership experience.Responsibilities: Support, collaborate, and/or take the lead in the following areas:Create omni-channel marketing and advertising campaignsCreate and build social media presence in line with PureMaven’s brand values and voiceLeverage technological tools such as CRM and conduct analyses to capture and identify key client and user insightsOrganize and deliver marketing and corporate events with top clientsResearch potential brand partners to grow our PureMaven communityManage outreach to potential brand partners and product send-outsRequirements:Strong desire to learn and collaborate with othersProactive and takes the initiative to identify and act on opportunities to help the teamPositive and team player attitude, with a strong commitment to excellenceA multi-tasker with excellent interpersonal and verbal & written communication skillsPassion for the health, beauty, and wellness industryCurrently enrolled in a related BS or Masters degreeBasic knowledge of typography, color, and graphic design fundamentalsExperience creating videos across social media platforms, mainly Instagram and TikTokUp-to-date computer skills, including Microsoft / Google Suite; experience with Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator, Canva, or Adobe Spark experience is a plusThis role is unpaid but eligible for expense reimbursementPosition is remote for the majority of the time; some in-person time may be required on a case-by-case basis, particularly for special marketing events15-19 hours/week for 4+ monthsApplicants are required during the interview process to verify with their university (e.g., academic advisor, internship coordinator) that they are eligible to obtain academic credit for the internship program and that the position satisfies the criteria for receiving academic credit This position complies with the Fair Labor Standard Act. Job ID 2024-MG-35_R

job_title: Fulfillment Area Manager Intern 2025 - SC, NC, VA, MD
description: This is not a corporate, remote or office-based position. This is a ten-week internship (40 hours per week) during the summer of 2025 located within one of Amazon’s fulfillment centers, sort centers, delivery stations or other operations buildings. Amazon is seeking customer focused individuals eager to develop a collaborative leadership style with a team of hourly employees across our cutting-edge Operations network! Our warehouses are fast-paced supply chain environments where standing, walking, and having on-the-production floor conversations are common.As an Area Manager Intern, you will have the opportunity to learn how to coach, motivate and mentor a team of Amazon associates in a warehouse environment. Amazon provides extensive training and development to become an exceptional people leader. Your main focus will be learning to manage a team as well as developing a summer project in partnership with your site leadership.Term: 10 weeksOur compensation reflects the cost of labor across several US geographic markets. The base pay for this position ranges from $26.44/hr in our lowest geographic market up to $31.49/hr in our highest geographic market. Pay is based on a number of factors including market location and may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience. Amazon is a total compensation company. Dependent on the position offered, equity, sign-on payments, and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package, in addition to a full range of medical, financial, and/or other benefits. For more information, please visit https://www.aboutamazon.com/workplace/employee-benefits. This position will remain posted until filled. Applicants should apply via our internal or external career site.Benefits: Access to Amazon's Medical Advice Line, Employee Assistance Program (EAP), and financial benefits.Visit www.aboutamazon.com/workplace/facilities to find more information on each of our building types.Please note we are not able to provide sponsorship now or in the future for these positions. Eligible candidates must have work authorization without employer intervention to be considered.This posting encompasses all openings in the state(s) listed in title. Site placement is determined by aligning your location preferences with location availability after your interview. Summer relocation and housing assistance provided if eligible.Key job responsibilities• Learn to coach, manage and develop a team of 50-100 Amazon Associates• Drive standard work and continuous improvement through an intern project• Work independently and operate in an autonomous environment• Stand/walk during shifts lasting up to 12 hours• Willing and able to regularly work shift patterns that include nights, weekends, and/or holidays based on business needs. While shifts vary site to site, most follow a fixed 4-day work week with 3 days off.• Oversee truck deliveries, handle and sort packages using pallet jacks, operate PIT equipment (at applicable facilities) and step in as needed.• Work in an environment where the noise level varies• Lift up to 49 pounds and frequently push, pull, squat, bend and reach• Climb and descend stairs (when applicable)BASIC QUALIFICATIONS• Currently enrolled in a bachelor’s degree program with all requirements anticipated to be completed between December 2025 and August 2026PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS• Strong communication skills, both verbal and written• Excellent customer service and interpersonal skills• Currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s program for Supply Chain, Business/Management, Engineering or another related field.Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status. For individuals with disabilities who would like to request an accommodation, please visit https://www.amazon.jobs/en/disability/us.

Eligible candidates must have work authorization without employer intervention to be considered.This posting encompasses all openings in the state(s) listed in title. Site placement is determined by aligning your location preferences with location availability after your interview. Summer relocation and housing assistance provided if eligible.Key job responsibilities• Learn to coach, manage and develop a team of 50-100 Amazon Associates• Drive standard work and continuous improvement through an intern project• Work independently and operate in an autonomous environment• Stand/walk during shifts lasting up to 12 hours• Willing and able to regularly work shift patterns that include nights, weekends, and/or holidays based on business needs. While shifts vary site to site, most follow a fixed 4-day work week with 3 days off.• Oversee truck deliveries, handle and sort packages using pallet jacks, operate PIT equipment (at applicable facilities) and step in as needed.• Work in an environment where the noise level varies• Lift up to 49 pounds and frequently push, pull, squat, bend and reach• Climb and descend stairs (when applicable)BASIC QUALIFICATIONS• Currently enrolled in a bachelor’s degree program with all requirements anticipated to be completed between December 2025 and August 2026PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS• Strong communication skills, both verbal and written• Excellent customer service and interpersonal skills• Currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s program for Supply Chain, Business/Management, Engineering or another related field.Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status. job_title: UX Designer（For Chinese students or non-Chinese students studying in China）
description: ！How to apply ！：Visit https://app.mokahr.com/su/zfvakd , find the Job Title and apply. You can go straight to the official website to submit your application through this link, and your resume will be processed more quickly.You will be responsible for:1、Designing the Online Travel Agent (OTA) product based on product requirements to enhance the user experience of Ctrip products;2、Analyzing project requirements, designing interaction schemes, creating high-fidelity prototypes, and completing interaction descriptions;3、Studying existing products, paying attention to competitors, and being able to participate in user research and usability testing to drive product creation or improvement;4、Tracking user feedback and online data, analyzing data changes to iterate and improve the product;5、Keeping an eye on design trends and competitive product movements, sharing design knowledge.We expect you to:1、Have a background in design or computer-related education;2、Have a profound knowledge base and solid practical experience in user experience design, with a complete and professional knowledge system;3、Proficiency in commonly used design tools, with an innovative spirit, and attention to industry design trends and thoughts;4、Excellent logical thinking ability, with a good grasp of both the overall and details of the design;5、Outstanding communication and cross-team collaboration skills, efficiently promoting the advancement of design projects;6、Good stress resistance and multitasking ability to ensure the progress of the planned solutions.

job_title: AI Trainer（Minor languages）【Only for Chinese students】
description: ！How to apply ！：Visit https://app.mokahr.com/su/zfvakd , find the Job Title and apply. You can go straight to the official website to submit your application through this link, and your resume will be processed more quickly.You will be responsible for: 1、Complete AI relevant training courses provided by AI team and get the AI trainer certification2、Design customer-robot interaction by reviewing our knowledge base, including Q&A maintenance to guarantee business coverage of the knowledgebase. Standard answer script writing and optimization natively in specific language and keep answers in line with updated business procedure. Optimize the content of the answers, business logic configurations and answer display according to customer’s needs and real time booking status. 3、Improve the customer intention recognition accuracy of the chat-bot by performing corpus annotation in a high-quality manner, which will be used for AI model training.4、Identify the issues in the customer-robot interactions, prudently analyze the relevant data and generate regular chat-bot performance reports, and continuously improve the algorithm model accuracy, customer satisfaction, and service performance of the chat-bot. 5、Analyze the agent sessions by looking into the conversation between customer-robot and customer – advisor, along with customer behavior during the service recorded in system, then find out the reason of transfer to agent, and come up with suggestions for chat-bot optimization. 6、Collaborate with relevant function teams to deliver an integrated workflow of demand negotiations, standard creations and project implementations.We expect you to：1、Strong data insight and analytical skills.2、Proficient communication skills, active learning capability, and sense of team spirit.3、Good at internal and external coordination, and excellent executive ability.4、Have a good command of Microsoft Office.5、Understanding of local culture and customer behavior.6、Language proficiency:English can be used in daily communication, especially in reading and writing. Fluent in your specified language—Portuguese/Thai.

description: Alignerr.com is a community of subject matter experts from several disciplines who align AI models by creating high-quality data in their field of expertise to build the future of Generative AI. Alignerr is operated by Labelbox. Labelbox is the leading data-centric AI platform for building intelligent applications. Teams looking to capitalize on the latest advances in generative AI and LLMs use the Labelbox platform to inject these systems with the right degree of human supervision and automation. Whether they are building AI products by using LLMs that require human fine-tuning, or applying AI to reduce the time associated with manually-intensive tasks like data labeling or finding business insights, Labelbox enables teams to do so effectively and quickly.Current Labelbox customers are transforming industries within insurance, retail, manufacturing/robotics, healthcare, and beyond. Our platform is used by Fortune 500 enterprises including Walmart, Procter & Gamble, Genentech, and Adobe, as well as hundreds of leading AI teams. We are backed by leading investors including SoftBank, Andreessen Horowitz, B Capital, Gradient Ventures (Google's AI-focused fund), Databricks Ventures, Snowpoint Ventures and Kleiner Perkins.About the Role Shape the future of AI in Physics.This innovative role as an AI Trainer - Physics offers a unique opportunity to leverage your subject-matter expertise and develop your AI skills. You will play a pivotal role in training AI models, ensuring the accuracy and relevance of Physics content generated by AI. This position allows for flexible scheduling, and your contributions will directly impact the advancement of AI in Physics.Your Day to Day Educate AI: Analyze and provide feedback on AI-generated outputs related to Physics Your guidance will directly improve the AI's accuracy and ability to apply its knowledge to real-world problems.Problem Solving: Using your expertise, you will provide step-by-step solutions and explanations to complex problems in Physics. This could include solving problems related to projectile motion, electromagnetic fields, wave interference, energy conservation, and relativity ,etc. Your input will be crucial in teaching the AI how to reason through these problems effectively.Red Teaming: Utilize your deep understanding of the field to identify potential biases, limitations, or inaccuracies in the AI's knowledge base. Design and conduct tests that push the boundaries of the model's understanding, ensuring its outputs are reliable and applicable to real-world scenarios.You create your own working hours depending on project length.About You Enrolled in or have completed an Associates’ degree or higher from an accredited institution.Native-level proficiency in Physics.Possess a strong writing style with excellent English-language spelling and grammar skills.Have a critical eye and the ability to clearly articulate the strengths and weaknesses of written text.Professional writing experience as a researcher, journalist, technical writer, editor, or similar rolesInterest in AI and machine learning conceptsImportant Information This is a freelance position compensated on an hourly basis. Please note that this is not an internship opportunity. Candidates must be authorized to work in their country of residence, and we do not offer sponsorship for this 1099 contract role. International students on a valid visa may be eligible to apply; however, specific circumstances should be discussed with a tax or immigration advisor. We are unable to provide employment documentation at this time. Compensation rates may vary for non-US locations.Pay Range (rate per hour)$15—$60 USDExcel in a remote-friendly hybrid model. We are dedicated to achieving excellence and recognize the importance of bringing our talented team together. While we continue to embrace remote work, we have transitioned to a hybrid model with a focus on nurturing collaboration and connection within our dedicated tech hubs in the San Francisco Bay Area, New York City Metro Area, and Wrocław, Poland. We encourage asynchronous communication, autonomy, and ownership of tasks, with the added convenience of hub-based gatherings.Your Personal Data Privacy: Any personal information you provide Labelbox as a part of your application will be processed in accordance with Labelbox’s Job Applicant Privacy notice.Any emails from Labelbox team members will originate from a @labelbox.com email address. If you encounter anything that raises suspicions during your interactions, we encourage you to exercise caution and suspend or discontinue communications. If you are uncertain about the legitimacy of any communication you have received, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at recruiting@labelbox.com for clarification and verification.

You will play a pivotal role in training AI models, ensuring the accuracy and relevance of Physics content generated by AI. This position allows for flexible scheduling, and your contributions will directly impact the advancement of AI in Physics., Enrolled in or have completed an Associates’ degree or higher from an accredited institution. Native-level proficiency in Physics. Possess a strong writing style with excellent English-language spelling and grammar skills. Have a critical eye and the ability to clearly articulate the strengths and weaknesses of written text. Professional writing experience as a researcher, journalist, technical writer, editor, or similar roles Interest in AI and machine learning concepts

description: Software EngineerAs a Software Engineer specializing in infrastructure, you will be at the forefront of developing and maintaining scalable, secure, and highly available agent infrastructure that handle concurrent access to agents and users for our growing user base. You will work closely with the UI/UX and product team to provide users a seamless, intuitive experience.Key Responsibilities:Design, develop, and maintain scalable, secure, and efficient agent serving infra that handle user data properly and support high concurrent user access.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand the needs for game interactions with agents and provide system and infrastructure solutions that enhance user experience.Optimize system architecture for high performance and scalability, employing best practices in caching, load balancing and user data management.Monitor, identify, and resolve infrastructure bottlenecks and performance issues in a timely manner. Required Skills and Qualifications:Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.Strong proficiency in backend programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, Go) and frameworks relevant to our tech stack.In-depth knowledge of database design and management (SQL, NoSQL) and experience with big data technologies.Experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes). Familiarity with continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes and tools.Excellent problem-solving skills, ability to work in a team environment, and strong communication skills.
Requirements: Design, develop, and maintain scalable, secure, and efficient agent serving infra that handle user data properly and support high concurrent user access. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand the needs for game interactions with agents and provide system and infrastructure solutions that enhance user experience. Optimize system architecture for high performance and scalability, employing best practices in caching, load balancing and user data management. Monitor, identify, and resolve infrastructure bottlenecks and performance issues in a timely manner., Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Strong proficiency in backend programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, Go) and frameworks relevant to our tech stack. In-depth knowledge of database design and management (SQL, NoSQL) and experience with big data technologies. Experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes). Familiarity with continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes and tools. Excellent problem-solving skills, ability to work in a team environment, and strong communication skills.

description: Job Title: Marketing Analyst InternLocation: RemotePosition Type: InternshipAbout Us: Roulettech, Inc. is dedicated to producing high-demand and high-quality technology products. Our mission is to leverage innovation to enhance everyday experiences and create value for our community. Our first product, Kangacook, is a recipe-sharing platform designed for the Chinese community in North America, helping users discover and recreate authentic Asian recipes with ease.Job Description:We are seeking a motivated intern to join our team and assist in managing our social media accounts dedicated to cooking, as well as contributing to our marketing strategy. This internship offers valuable hands-on experience in social media management within the culinary and food influencer space, including advertisement planning and digital marketing analysis.Responsibilities:Create engaging and visually appealing content for Instagram, including original photos, videos, and graphics related to cooking.Research trending topics and hashtags to optimize reach and engagement.Monitor and respond to comments and direct messages promptly and professionally.Collaborate with team members to plan and execute content calendar and campaigns.Analyze performance metrics and provide insights for continual improvement.Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in social media and culinary content.Requirements:Basic understanding of Google Analytics.Basic understanding of email marketing.Basic understanding of Instagram and other social media platforms.Interest in digital marketing and willingness to learn.Strong communication and writing skills.Creativity and ability to think outside the box.Detail-oriented and organized with the ability to multitask.Ability to work independently and as part of a team.Photography and/or video editing skills (preferred but not required).Passion for cooking and culinary arts. Application Process:To apply, please submit your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your interest in the position and relevant experience. Include any social media handles or portfolios showcasing your work, if available.

job_title: Research Scientist Intern (TikTok Core Recommendation) - 2024 Off-Cycle (PhD)
description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. Why Join UsCreation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.Join us. Team IntroductionTikTok-Data RecCore team is responsible for TikTok recommendation algorithms and directly responsible for TikTok core User Experience. Our work includes optimizing large-scale recommendation algorithms, solving optimization problems with complex constraints, improving algorithms in multiple academic fields such as CV/NLP, designing recommendation architectures for various scenarios, and conducting complex and in-depth analysis of product data. Here, you can delve into the improvement and optimization of Machine Learning algorithms, explore cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with teams from different countries around the world, experience the collision of different cultures, and stimulate cognition. Through in-depth analysis of product and content ecology, you can influence the future development direction of the product. We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2024. Internships at TikTok aim to offer students industry exposure and hands-on experience. Turn your ambitions into reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at TikTok. This Internship Program runs for 10-24 weeks. Candidates will apply for the off-cycle Internship Program. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. We encourage you to apply early. Candidates can apply to a maximum of TWO positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.  Why Join Us Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. Join us.  Team Introduction TikTok-Data RecCore team is responsible for TikTok recommendation algorithms and directly responsible for TikTok core User Experience. Our work includes optimizing large-scale recommendation algorithms, solving optimization problems with complex constraints, improving algorithms in multiple academic fields such as CV/NLP, designing recommendation architectures for various scenarios, and conducting complex and in-depth analysis of product data. Here, you can delve into the improvement and optimization of Machine Learning algorithms, explore cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with teams from different countries around the world, experience the collision of different cultures, and stimulate cognition. Through in-depth analysis of product and content ecology, you can influence the future development direction of the product. description: ！How to apply ！：Visit https://app.mokahr.com/su/zfvakd , find the Job Title and apply. You can go straight to the official website to submit your application through this link, and your resume will be processed more quickly.You will be responsible for:1.Manage the daily operations of Trip.com products, ensure the functioning of all product resources; assist in the establishment of operational rules and promoting the implementation and achievement of operational plans;2.Master the dynamic and static information of competitive products, responsible for competitive product analysis, ensure the effectiveness and visualization of competitive product data collection, and assist in the formulation of business plans and strategies;3.Expand supplier networks and project collaborations; conduct regular supplier evaluations, maintain relationships, and guide operational processes, addressing emergencies to ensure product continuity.We hope you have:1.Excellent business data analysis skills, capable of using Excel, SPSS, Python, R, etc., for data analysis, mining, and visualization;2.Strong writing skills and creative ideas for event operations, familiar with internet products, and passionate about the travel industry;3.Excellent project management skills, strong execution ability, a sense of responsibility, strong learning ability and initiative, capable of driving the implementation and landing of projects;4.The following will be preferred: Excellent English proficiency, able to use English as a working language.

description: Marketing Specialist (Entry Level)Data-Core Systems, Inc. is a provider of information technology, consulting and business process services. We offer breakthrough tech solutions and have worked with companies, hospitals, universities and government organizations. A proven partner with a passion for client satisfaction, we combine technology innovation, business process expertise and a global, collaborative workforce that exemplifies the future of work. For more information about Data-Core Systems, Inc., please visit https://datacoresystems.com.Data-Core Systems seeks a dynamic, self-starter to join a marketing team and lead the creation and execution efforts for both client-facing and internal sales in social media, advertising, email and in-bound marketing. Using the latest in marketing automation tools the Marketing Specialist will review the data gathered to guide strategic decisions.As a Marketing Specialist, you will be an integral part of the development and execution of marketing plans to reach targets from brand awareness to product promotion.Responsibilities:Create content for collateral and presentationsDevelop social media outreachApply digital marketing techniques for customer acquisitionDevelop and maintain Website contentConduct industry related researchParticipate in trade shows and conferencesCoordinate concurrent email, online and direct marketing campaigns with our sales teamSkills and Qualifications:Bachelor’s Degree, preferably in a related field (e.g. Communications, Marketing, Business Administration)Creative mindset and strong attention to detailExperience or familiarity with Graphics Design, Microsoft Office Suite, Website creation, SEO, Digital Marketing, Social Media and Google Analytics a plusPositive attitude with superior communication skillsWillingness to travel and attend networking and trade show events (Approx. 5%)At Data Core, we offer the following employee benefits: Medical, vision, and dental coverage; paid vacation and holidays. Employees are also eligible for a company matched 401k plan, life insurance and disability.We are an equal opportunity employer.
Requirements: Create content for collateral and presentations Develop social media outreach Apply digital marketing techniques for customer acquisition Develop and maintain Website content Conduct industry related research Participate in trade shows and conferences Coordinate concurrent email, online and direct marketing campaigns with our sales team, Bachelor’s Degree, preferably in a related field (e.g. Communications, Marketing, Business Administration) Creative mindset and strong attention to detail Experience or familiarity with Graphics Design, Microsoft Office Suite, Website creation, SEO, Digital Marketing, Social Media and Google Analytics a plus Positive attitude with superior communication skills Willingness to travel and attend networking and trade show events (Approx. 5%) At Data Core, we offer the following employee benefits: Medical, vision, and dental coverage; paid vacation and holidays.  Employees are also eligible for a company matched 401k plan, life insurance and disability. We are an equal opportunity employer.

description: Summit Technology Group is seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Accounting Associate to join our dynamic accounting/finance team. The ideal candidate will have 3-5 years of relevant experience in accounting, preferably in financial services or technology industries. A strong foundation in financial reconciliations, GAAP accounting, proficiency in accounting software, and Microsoft Office Suite is essential. The Accounting Associate will be responsible for conducting everyday tasks such as recording transactions, organizing financial reports, and assisting with daily and monthly reconciliations. Responsibilities:Manage and process invoices, ensuring timely payments and accurate records.Reconcile accounts receivable and accounts payable ledgers.Perform reconciliations of all accounts to ensure accuracy and compliance with internal and external reporting standards.Update financial data in databases to ensure that information will be accurate and immediately available when needed.Performing routine accounting activities such as maintenance of the general ledger and preparation of various accounting statements and financial reports.Assist senior accountants in the preparation of monthly/yearly closings.Comply with financial policies and regulations.Assist with the preparation of audit schedules and support audits as needed.Prepare and present findings to management as required.Conduct variance analysis and provide explanations for discrepancies.Performing administrative tasks as needed.Support the accounting team with special projects, ad-hoc reporting and analysis requests, and other tasks as assigned.Assist in preparing and filing tax returns and ensure compliance with applicable tax regulations.Requirements:Proven experience as an Accounting Associate or similar role.Excellent knowledge of MS OfficeExperience with general ledger functions and the month-end/year-end close processAccuracy and attention to detailAptitude for numbers and quantitative skillsDegree in Accounting, Finance or relevant fieldLocal to the Mechanicsburg, PA Office, in the office at least 3 days a week.Perks:Competitive salary and benefits package (free dental, vision, life, and disability coverage!)Unlimited PTO - deliver for your clients and company, enjoy time off as you define itA flexible work environment with options for remote work.Collaborative team culture that values innovation and creativity.Company-sponsored social events and activities.Access to cutting-edge technology and resources.If you're ready to take your accounting career to the next level and be part of a team that values creativity and innovation, apply now! We can't wait to meet you and see how you'll contribute to our success.Summit Technology Group is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to providing a workplace free from harassment and discrimination. We celebrate our employees' unique differences because that drives curiosity, innovation, and the success of our business. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy, parental status, genetic information, political affiliation, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Accommodations are available for applicants with disabilities.
Requirements: Proven experience as an Accounting Associate or similar role. Excellent knowledge of MS Office Experience with general ledger functions and the month-end/year-end close process Accuracy and attention to detail Aptitude for numbers and quantitative skills Degree in Accounting, Finance or relevant field Local to the Mechanicsburg, PA Office, in the office at least 3 days a week.

job_title: Content Creator & Social Media Marketing Intern
description: 🚀 Join the With Bytes Squad!Hey there, future content creator. With Bytes is a forward-thinking tech company that develops a range of consumer mobile apps designed to make life better, easier, and more fun. We’re on the lookout for creative and energetic Student Marketers who can help us create standout TikToks and Instagram Reels for our apps. If you’re passionate about social media and love experimenting with the latest trends, we want to hear from you! 🌟 What You’ll Do:As our Content Creator & Social Media Marketing Intern, you’ll jump into the world of TikTok and Instagram content creation. You’ll be crafting and sharing engaging content, collaborating with our team to develop social media strategies, and helping our apps connect with audiences worldwide. ✨ Your Daily Vibe:• Create and post dynamic TikTok videos and Instagram Reels that highlight our apps• Collaborate with our team to brainstorm fresh content ideas and jump on trending topics• Analyze performance metrics to fine-tune your content for maximum impact• Work with UGC creators to expand our content reach 💡 Who You Are:• A college student with a passion for social media, especially TikTok and Instagram• Creative, innovative, and always online—you’re in the know with trends• Comfortable with TikTok video-editing and creating eye-catching content• A self-starter who thrives in a remote work environment 🎁 What’s In It For You:• Real Experience: Work with a growing tech company and build your portfolio• Flexibility: Adjust your work hours around your class schedule• Creative Freedom: Experiment with new ideas without posting on your personal accounts• Academic Credits: Eligible students can use this internship for academic credits (check with your university)• Professional Networking Opportunities: Connect with like-minded individuals in the industry 🚀 How to Apply:Ready to make waves with your content? Send us your TikTok or Instagram handle along with a quick note on why you’re excited to join With Bytes. We’re hiring fast, so don’t miss out—apply today! Note: This is a part-time, unpaid internship with a flexible schedule, perfect for students. Expect to work only a few hours a week.

description: BluChip Ambassador Internship for Student-Athletes (Remote)*Applicants should be a current or former college student-athlete. If you are a student-athlete looking to add real-time start-up and business experience to your credentials, join BluChip as a Student-Athlete Ambassador. You’ll have a seat at the table with BluChip’s Leadership team to learn and experience business operations, strategy, and the launch of a new digital platform connecting student-athletes with employers. This opportunity provides student-athletes with real-world experiences that will serve them beyond the classroom and field of play and well into the future.Student-Athlete Ambassadors apply business, communication, and marketing lessons learned to:Promote the BluChip platform on campus and onlineDrive student-athlete profiles and signupsCollaborate with the BluChip Leadership team to provide feedback on product and strategySuccessful BluChip Campus Ambassadors are:Motivated learners interested in growing leadership, business, and marketing skillsStrong communicators comfortable with digital media and social media toolsEntrepreneurial-mindedThis internship is unpaid but bonus opportunities are available for interns who exceed performance goals.
Requirements: BluChip Ambassador Internship for Student-Athletes (Remote)*Applicants should be a current or former college student-athlete. If you are a student-athlete looking to add real-time start-up and business experience to your credentials, join BluChip as a Student-Athlete Ambassador. You’ll have a seat at the table with BluChip’s Leadership team to learn and experience business operations, strategy, and the launch of a new digital platform connecting student-athletes with employers. This opportunity provides student-athletes with real-world experiences that will serve them beyond the classroom and field of play and well into the future.Student-Athlete Ambassadors apply business, communication, and marketing lessons learned to:Promote the BluChip platform on campus and onlineDrive student-athlete profiles and signupsCollaborate with the BluChip Leadership team to provide feedback on product and strategySuccessful BluChip Campus Ambassadors are:Motivated learners interested in growing leadership, business, and marketing skillsStrong communicators comfortable with digital media and social media toolsEntrepreneurial-mindedThis internship is unpaid but bonus opportunities are available for interns who exceed performance goals.

job_title: Customer Service Experience Management（Only for non-Chinese students studying in China）
description: You will be responsible for:1. Familiar with team management: responsible for training, evaluating, and managing the call center customer service team, clarifying direction, allocating workload reasonably, and ensuring that team members can efficiently handle customer issues and complaints.2. Familiar with quality monitoring: Supervise the team to achieve daily indicators, including call quality, efficiency, service level, etc. Follow up on issues discovered during the service process, actively communicate and coordinate, improve customer service efficiency, and ensure customer and merchant experience.3. Familiar with process optimization: Develop service SOPs and work manuals, supervise team execution, and continuously improve service processes and standards to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty.4. Familiarity with data analysis: Collect, analyze, and interpret call center data to improve call center processes and increase customer satisfaction.5. Participate in problem-solving: Handle customer complaints and disputes as a backup to ensure timely resolution of customer issues. Maintain a team work atmosphere and handle employee relationship issues.6. Participate in team collaboration: Collaborate with processes, quality, projects, and other teams to achieve a closed-loop operation and management of service quality, and promote continuous improvement of service quality.We expect you to:1. Equivalent to a full-time undergraduate degree or above in China.2. Language proficiency requirements: Proficient in English listening, speaking, reading, and writing, and proficient in daily work communication in Chinese.3. Passionate about tourism and willing to develop in China for the long term.4. Good logical thinking and communication skills, as well as strong data mining and analysis abilities.
